  21  /**
  22   * Log the user out
  23   */
  24  function logout()
  25  {
  26      global $current_User, $Session, $Plugins;
  27  
  28      $Plugins->trigger_event( 'Logout', array( 'User' => $current_User ) );
  29  
  30      // Reset all global variables
  31      // Note: unset is bugguy on globals
  32      $current_User = NULL; // NULL, as we do isset() on it in several places!
  33  
  34      $Session->logout();
  35  }

  38  /**
  39   * is_logged_in(-)
  40   *
  41   * @param boolean true if not active users are considerated as logged in users, false otherwise
  42   */
  43  function is_logged_in( $accept_not_active = true )
  44  {
  45      global $current_User;
  46  
  47      return is_object( $current_User ) && !empty( $current_User->ID ) && ( $accept_not_active || $current_User->check_status( 'is_validated' ) );
  48  }

  51  /**
  52   * Check if current User status permit the give action
  53   *
  54   * @param string action
  55   * @param integger target ID - can be a post ID, user ID
  56   * @return boolean true if the user is loggedn in and the action is permitted, false otherwise
  57   */
  58  function check_user_status( $action, $target = NULL )
  59  {
  60      global $current_User;
  61  
  62      if( !is_logged_in() )
  63      {
  64          return false;
  65      }
  66  
  67      return $current_User->check_status( $action, $target );
  68  }

  71  /**
  72   * Check if a password is ok for a login.
  73   *
  74   * @param string login
  75   * @param string password
  76   * @param boolean Is the password parameter already MD5()'ed?
  77   * @return boolean
  78   */
  79  function user_pass_ok( $login, $pass, $pass_is_md5 = false )
  80  {
  81      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
  82      $User = & $UserCache->get_by_login( $login );
  83      if( !$User )
  84      {
  85          return false;
  86      }
  87      // echo 'got data for: ', $User->login;
  88  
  89      return $User->check_password( $pass, $pass_is_md5 );
  90  }

 102  /**
 103   * Get link to login
 104   *
 105   * @param string Text before link
 106   * @param string Text after link
 107   * @param string Link text
 108   * @param string Link title
 109   * @param string Source
 110   * @return string Link for log in
 111   */
 112  function get_user_login_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#', $source = 'user login link', $redirect_to = NULL )
 113  {
 114      if( is_logged_in() ) return false;
 115  
 116      if( $link_text == '' ) $link_text = T_('Log in');
 117      if( $link_title == '#' ) $link_title = T_('Log in if you have an account...');
 118  
 119      $r = $before;
 120      $r .= '<a href="'.get_login_url( $source, $redirect_to ).'" title="'.$link_title.'">';
 121      $r .= $link_text;
 122      $r .= '</a>';
 123      $r .= $after;
 124  
 125      return $r;
 126  }

 129  /**
 130   * Get user's login with gender color
 131   *
 132   * @param string Login
 133   * @param array Params
 134   * @return string User's preferred name with gender color if this available
 135   */
 136  function get_user_colored_login( $login, $params = array() )
 137  {
 138      $params = array_merge( array(
 139              'mask' => '$avatar$ $login$'
 140          ) );
 141  
 142      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
 143      $User = & $UserCache->get_by_login( $login );
 144      if( !$User )
 145      { // User doesn't exist by some reason, maybe it was deleted right now
 146          // Return only login
 147          return $login;
 148      }
 149  
 150      return $User->get_colored_login( $params );
 151  }

 154  /**
 155   * Get user's login link with gender color
 156   *
 157   * @param string Login
 158   * @param array Params
 159   * @return string A link to user page with text as user's preferred name with gender color if this available
 160   */
 161  function get_user_colored_login_link( $login, $params = array() )
 162  {
 163      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
 164      if( $User = & $UserCache->get_by_login( $login ) )
 165      { // Get a link to user page in front office
 166          return $User->get_identity_link( array(
 167                  'user_tab'  => 'userpage',
 168                  'use_style' => ! empty( $params['use_style'] )
 169              ) );
 170      }
 171      else
 172      { // Get login as text
 173          return get_user_colored_login( $login, $params );
 174      }
 175  }

 178  /**
 179   * Get url to login
 180   *
 181   * @param string describe the source ina word or two, used for stats (search current calls to this function for examples)
 182   * @param string URL to redirect
 183   * @param boolean TRUE to use normal login form(ignore in-skin login form)
 184   * @param integer blog ID for the requested blog. NULL for current $Blog
 185   * @param string Blog page param, @see Blog->get()
 186   * @return string URL
 187   */
 188  function get_login_url( $source, $redirect_to = NULL, $force_normal_login = false, $blog_ID = NULL, $blog_page = 'loginurl' )
 189  {
 190      global $secure_htsrv_url;
 191  
 192      // This URL is used to redirect after SUCCESS login action
 193      $redirect_url = empty( $redirect_to ) ? regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ) : $redirect_to;
 194  
 195      // This URL is used to redirect after ABORT login action
 196      $return_url = param( 'return_to', 'url', '' );
 197      if( empty( $return_url ) )
 198      {
 199          $return_url = url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ), $secure_htsrv_url );
 200      }
 201  
 202      if( ! $force_normal_login && use_in_skin_login() )
 203      { // Use in-skin login form of the current blog or of the special blog for login/register actions
 204          if( empty( $blog_ID ) )
 205          { // Use current blog if it is not defined
 206              global $blog;
 207              $blog_ID = $blog;
 208          }
 209          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 210          $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID );
 211          if( ! empty( $redirect_url ) )
 212          {
 213              $redirect_url = url_rel_to_same_host( $redirect_url, $Blog->get( $blog_page, array( 'glue' => '&' ) ) );
 214          }
 215          if( ! empty( $redirect_url ) )
 216          {
 217              $return_url = url_rel_to_same_host( $return_url, $Blog->get( $blog_page, array( 'glue' => '&' ) ) );
 218          }
 219          $url = $Blog->get( $blog_page, array( 'glue' => '&' ) );
 220      }
 221      else
 222      { // Use normal/standard login form (without blog skin)
 223          if( ! empty( $redirect_url ) )
 224          {
 225              $redirect_url = url_rel_to_same_host( $redirect_url, $secure_htsrv_url );
 226          }
 227          if( ! empty( $redirect_url ) )
 228          {
 229              $return_url = url_rel_to_same_host( $return_url, $secure_htsrv_url );
 230          }
 231          $url = $secure_htsrv_url.'login.php';
 232      }
 233  
 234      return url_add_param( $url, 'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $redirect_url )
 235              .'&return_to='.rawurlencode( $return_url )
 236              .'&source='.rawurlencode( $source ), '&' );
 237  }

 240  /**
 241   * Get url to show user a form to restore a lost passowrd
 242   *
 243   * @param string URL to redirect, FALSE - don't use a redirect
 244   * @param string delimiter to use for more url params
 245   * @param string URL to return after ABORT login action, FALSE - don't use a return url
 246   * @return string URL
 247   */
 248  function get_lostpassword_url( $redirect_to = NULL, $glue = '&amp;', $return_to = NULL )
 249  {
 250      global $Blog, $secure_htsrv_url;
 251  
 252      if( empty( $redirect_to ) && $redirect_to !== false )
 253      { // Redirect back to current URL
 254          $redirect_to = url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( '', '', '', $glue ), $secure_htsrv_url );
 255      }
 256  
 257      // This URL is used to redirect after ABORT login action:
 258      if( empty( $return_to ) && $return_to !== false  )
 259      {
 260          $return_to = url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( '', '', '', $glue ), $secure_htsrv_url );
 261      }
 262  
 263      if( use_in_skin_login() )
 264      { // Use in-skin lostpassword form of the current blog or of the special blog for login/register actions
 265          $lostpassword_url = $Blog->get( 'lostpasswordurl', array( 'glue' => $glue ) );
 266      }
 267      else
 268      { // Use normal/standard lostpassword form (without blog skin)
 269          $lostpassword_url = $secure_htsrv_url.'login.php?action=lostpassword';
 270      }
 271  
 272      if( $redirect_to !== false )
 273      { // Append redirect URL only when it is not restricted:
 274          $lostpassword_url = url_add_param( $lostpassword_url, 'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $redirect_to ), $glue );
 275      }
 276  
 277      if( $return_to !== false )
 278      { // Append return URL only when it is not restricted:
 279          $lostpassword_url = url_add_param( $lostpassword_url, 'return_to='.rawurlencode( $return_to ), $glue );
 280      }
 281  
 282      return $lostpassword_url;
 283  }

 286  /**
 287   * Get url to show user activate info screen
 288   *
 289   * @param string URL to redirect
 290   * @param string delimiter to use for more url params
 291   * @return string URL
 292   */
 293  function get_activate_info_url( $redirect_to = NULL, $glue = '&' )
 294  {
 295      global $Blog, $secure_htsrv_url;
 296  
 297      if( empty( $redirect_to ) )
 298      { // Redirect back to current URL
 299          $redirect_to = rawurlencode( url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( '', '', '', $glue ), $secure_htsrv_url ) );
 300      }
 301  
 302      if( use_in_skin_login() )
 303      { // Use in-skin activate info page of the current blog or of the special blog for login/register actions
 304          $activateinfo_url = $Blog->get( 'activateinfourl', array( 'glue' => $glue ) );
 305      }
 306      else
 307      { // Use normal/standard lostpassword form (without blog skin)
 308          $activateinfo_url = $secure_htsrv_url.'login.php?action=req_validatemail';
 309      }
 310  
 311      return url_add_param( $activateinfo_url, 'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $redirect_to ), $glue ) ;
 312  }

 315  /**
 316   * Get url to show user a form of notification settings
 317   *
 318   * @param string delimiter to use for more url params
 319   * @param integer|NULL User ID, NULL - use current user
 320   * @return string URL
 321   */
 322  function get_notifications_url( $glue = '&amp;', $user_ID = NULL )
 323  {
 324      global $blog, $Blog, $admin_url;
 325  
 326      if( ! empty( $blog ) && empty( $Blog ) )
 327      { // Try to initialize global $Blog object
 328          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 329          $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false, false );
 330      }
 331  
 332      $use_admin_page_url = false;
 333      if( is_admin_page() || empty( $Blog ) )
 334      { // Check if the user has an access to backoffice
 335          if( is_null( $user_ID ) )
 336          { // Use current user
 337              global $current_User;
 338              $User = & $current_User;
 339          }
 340          else
 341          { // Get user by ID
 342              $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
 343              $User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
 344          }
 345          if( ! empty( $User ) && $User->check_perm( 'admin', 'restricted' ) )
 346          { // The user has an access to backoffice
 347              $use_admin_page_url = true;
 348          }
 349      }
 350  
 351      if( $use_admin_page_url )
 352      { // Use backoffice form of notifications form
 353          return $admin_url.'?ctrl=user'.$glue.'user_tab=subs';
 354      }
 355      else
 356      { // Use in-skin form of notifications form:
 357          if( empty( $Blog ) )
 358          { // If no current blog, try to use a default blog:
 359              $url_Blog = & get_setting_Blog( 'default_blog_ID' );
 360              if( empty( $url_Blog ) )
 361              { // No default blog, Use base url:
 362                  global $baseurl;
 363                  return url_add_param( $baseurl, 'disp=subs' );
 364              }
 365          }
 366          else
 367          { // Use current blog:
 368              $url_Blog = & $Blog;
 369          }
 370          return $url_Blog->get( 'subsurl', array( 'glue' => $glue ) );
 371      }
 372  }

 375  /**
 376   * Get url where to redirect, after successful account activation
 377   */
 378  function redirect_after_account_activation()
 379  {
 380      global $Settings, $Session, $baseurl;
 381  
 382      // Get general "Users setting" to determine if we want to return to original page after account activation or to a specific url:
 383      $redirect_to = $Settings->get( 'after_email_validation' );
 384      if( $redirect_to == 'return_to_original' )
 385      { // we want to return to original page after account activation
 386          // the redirect_to param should be set in the Session. This was set when the account activation email was sent.
 387          $redirect_to = $Session->get( 'core.validatemail.redirect_to' );
 388          // if the redirect_to is not set in the Session or is empty, we MUST NEVER let to redirect back to the origianl page which can be hotmail, gmail, etc.
 389          if( empty( $redirect_to ) )
 390          { // session redirect_to was not set, initialize $redirect_to to the home page
 391              $redirect_to = $baseurl;
 392          }
 393      }
 394  
 395      return $redirect_to;
 396  }

 399  /**
 400   * Send notification to users with edit users permission
 401   *
 402   * @param string notification email suject
 403   * @param string notificaiton email template name
 404   * @param array notification email template params
 405   */
 406  function send_admin_notification( $subject, $template_name, $template_params )
 407  {
 408      global $Session, $UserSettings, $current_User;
 409  
 410      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
 411      $template_params = array_merge( array(
 412              'login' => '',
 413          ), $template_params );
 414  
 415      // Set default subject and permname:
 416      $subject_suffix = ': '.$template_params['login'];
 417      $perm_name = 'users';
 418  
 419      switch( $template_name )
 420      {
 421          case 'account_new':
 422              $check_setting = 'notify_new_user_registration';
 423              break;
 424  
 425          case 'account_activated':
 426              $check_setting = 'notify_activated_account';
 427              break;
 428  
 429          case 'account_closed':
 430              $check_setting = 'notify_closed_account';
 431              break;
 432  
 433          case 'account_reported':
 434              $check_setting = 'notify_reported_account';
 435              break;
 436  
 437          case 'account_changed':
 438              $check_setting = 'notify_changed_account';
 439              break;
 440  
 441          case 'scheduled_task_error_report':
 442              $subject_suffix = '';
 443              $check_setting = 'notify_cronjob_error';
 444              $perm_name = 'options';
 445              break;
 446  
 447          default:
 448              debug_die( 'Unhandled admin notification template!' );
 449      }
 450  
 451      if( empty( $current_User ) && !empty( $Session ) && $Session->has_User() )
 452      { // current_User is not set at the time of registration
 453          $current_User = & $Session->get_User();
 454      }
 455  
 456      if( empty( $UserSettings ) )
 457      { // initialize UserSettings
 458          load_class( 'users/model/_usersettings.class.php', 'UserSettings' );
 459          $UserSettings = new UserSettings();
 460      }
 461  
 462      // load users with edit all users permission
 463      $UserCache->load_where( 'user_grp_ID = 1 OR user_grp_ID IN ( SELECT gset_grp_ID FROM T_groups__groupsettings WHERE gset_name = "perm_'.$perm_name.'" AND gset_value = "edit" )' );
 464      // iterate through UserCache
 465      $UserCache->rewind();
 466      while( $User = & $UserCache->get_next() )
 467      { // Loop through Users
 468          if( is_logged_in() && $current_User->ID == $User->ID )
 469          { // Don't send a notification to current user, because he already knows about this event
 470              continue;
 471          }
 472          if( $UserSettings->get( $check_setting, $User->ID ) && $User->check_perm( $perm_name, 'edit' ) )
 473          { // this user must be notifed
 474              locale_temp_switch( $User->get( 'locale' ) );
 475              // send mail to user (using his local)
 476              $localized_subject = T_( $subject ).$subject_suffix;
 477              send_mail_to_User( $User->ID, $localized_subject, $template_name, $template_params ); // ok, if this may fail
 478              locale_restore_previous();
 479          }
 480      }
 481  }

 484  /**
 485   * Use in-skin login
 486   */
 487  function use_in_skin_login()
 488  {
 489      global $Blog, $blog;
 490  
 491      if( is_admin_page() )
 492      { // Back-office page
 493          return false;
 494      }
 495  
 496      if( empty( $blog ) )
 497      { // No current blog selected
 498          return false;
 499      }
 500  
 501      if( empty( $Blog ) )
 502      { // Try to initialize global $Blog object
 503          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 504          $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false, false );
 505      }
 506  
 507      if( get_setting_Blog( 'login_blog_ID' ) )
 508      { // If special blog is defined for all login actions
 509          return true;
 510      }
 511  
 512      if( empty( $Blog ) )
 513      { // No current blog found in DB
 514          return false;
 515      }
 516  
 517      return $Blog->get_setting( 'in_skin_login' );
 518  }

 521  /**
 522   * Check if show toolbar
 523   */
 524  function show_toolbar()
 525  {
 526      global $current_User;
 527      return ( is_logged_in() && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'toolbar' ) ) );
 528  }

 531  /**
 532   * Check a settings from user for Back office and from skin for Front office
 533   *
 534   * @param string Setting name ( gender_colored OR bubbletip)
 535   * @return bool Use colored gender
 536   */
 537  function check_setting( $setting_name )
 538  {
 539      global $Settings, $Blog;
 540  
 541      if( is_admin_page() || empty( $Blog ) )
 542      { // Check setting in the Back office or when Blog is not defined
 543          if( $Settings->get( $setting_name ) )
 544          { // Set TRUE if the setting is ON
 545              return true;
 546          }
 547      }
 548      else
 549      { // Check setting in the Front office for current blog & skin
 550          $SkinCache = & get_SkinCache();
 551          $skin = & $SkinCache->get_by_ID( $Blog->get( 'skin_ID' ) );
 552          if( $skin->get_setting( $setting_name ) )
 553          { // If setting is ON for current Blog & Skin
 554              if( $setting_name == 'bubbletip' )
 555              { // Check separate case for setting 'bubbletip'
 556                  if( is_logged_in() || $Settings->get( $setting_name.'_anonymous' ) )
 557                  { // If user is logged in OR Anonymous user can see bubbletips
 558                      return true;
 559                  }
 560              }
 561              else
 562              { // Setting 'gender_colored' doesn't depend on user's logged status
 563                  return true;
 564              }
 565          }
 566      }
 567  
 568      return false;
 569  }

 581   * @param string Link class
 582   * @param string Used for source tracking if $source is not already set
 583   */
 584  function user_register_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#', $disp_when_logged_in = false, $redirect = null, $default_source_string = '', $link_class = '' )

 590  /**
 591   * Template tag: Get a link to new user registration
 592   *
 593   * @param string Before the link
 594   * @param string After the link
 595   * @param string Link text, "Register" by default
 596   * @param string Link title, "Register for a new account..." by default
 597   * @param boolean Display the link, if the user is already logged in? (this is used by the login form)
 598   * @param string Where to redirect
 599   * @param string Used for source tracking
 600   * @param string Link class
 601   * @return string The link to new user registration on success, empty string otherwise
 602   */
 603  function get_user_register_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#',
 604          $disp_when_logged_in = false, $redirect = null, $default_source_string = '', $link_class = '' )
 605  {
 606      $register_url = get_user_register_url( $redirect, $default_source_string, $disp_when_logged_in );
 607  
 608      if( !$register_url )
 609      {
 610          return '';
 611      }
 612  
 613      if( $link_text == '' ) $link_text = T_('Register').' &raquo;';
 614      if( $link_title == '#' ) $link_title = T_('Register for a new account...');
 615  
 616      if( $link_class != '' )
 617      { // Use a link class if it is defined
 618          $link_class = ' class="'.$link_class.'"';
 619      }
 620  
 621      $r = $before;
 622      $r .= '<a href="'.$register_url.'" title="'.$link_title.'"'.$link_class.'>';
 623      $r .= $link_text;
 624      $r .= '</a>';
 625      $r .= $after;
 626      return $r;
 627  }

 630  /**
 631   * Get a user registration url
 632   *
 633   * @param string redirect to url
 634   * @param string where this registration url will be displayed
 635   * @param boolean force to display even when a user is logged in
 636   * @param string delimiter to use for more url params
 637   * @param integer blog ID for the requested blog. NULL for current $Blog
 638   * @return string URL
 639   */
 640  function get_user_register_url( $redirect_to = NULL, $default_source_string = '', $disp_when_logged_in = false, $glue = '&amp;', $blog_ID = NULL )
 641  {
 642      global $Settings, $edited_Blog, $secure_htsrv_url;
 643  
 644      if( is_logged_in() && ! $disp_when_logged_in )
 645      { // Do not display, when already logged in:
 646          return false;
 647      }
 648  
 649      if( $Settings->get( 'newusers_canregister' ) == 'no' )
 650      { // We won't let him register
 651          return false;
 652      }
 653  
 654      if( ( ! is_logged_in() ) && ( ! $Settings->get( 'registration_is_public' ) ) )
 655      { // Don't show registration link if it is not forced to display when a user is already logged in
 656          return false;
 657      }
 658  
 659      if( use_in_skin_login() )
 660      { // Use in-skin register form of the current blog or of the special blog for login/register actions
 661          if( empty( $blog_ID ) )
 662          { // Use current blog if it is not defined
 663              global $blog;
 664              $blog_ID = $blog;
 665          }
 666  
 667          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 668          $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID );
 669  
 670          $register_url = $Blog->get( 'registerurl', array( 'glue' => $glue ) );
 671      }
 672      else
 673      { // Use normal/standard register form (without blog skin)
 674          $register_url = $secure_htsrv_url.'register.php';
 675      }
 676  
 677      // Source
 678      $source = param( 'source', 'string', '' );
 679      if( empty( $source ) )
 680      {
 681          $source = $default_source_string;
 682      }
 683      if( ! empty( $source ) )
 684      {
 685          $register_url = url_add_param( $register_url, 'source='.rawurlencode( $source ), $glue );
 686      }
 687  
 688      if( ! isset( $redirect_to ) )
 689      { // Set where to redirect
 690          $redirect_to = regenerate_url( '', '', '', $glue );
 691      }
 692  
 693      if( ! empty( $redirect_to ) )
 694      {
 695          $register_url = url_add_param( $register_url, 'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( url_rel_to_same_host( $redirect_to, $secure_htsrv_url ) ), $glue );
 696      }
 697  
 698      // This URL is used to redirect after ABORT login action
 699      $return_url = param( 'return_to', 'url', '' );
 700      if( empty( $return_url ) )
 701      {
 702          $return_url = url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ), $secure_htsrv_url );
 703      }
 704  
 705      $register_url = url_add_param( $register_url, 'return_to='.rawurlencode( $return_url ), $glue );
 706  
 707      return $register_url;
 708  }

 720  /**
 721   * Template tag: Get a link to logout
 722   *
 723   * @param string
 724   * @param string
 725   * @param string link text can include %s for current user login
 726   * @return string
 727   */
 728  function get_user_logout_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#', $params = array() )
 729  {
 730      global $current_User;
 731  
 732      if( ! is_logged_in() )
 733      {
 734          return false;
 735      }
 736  
 737      if( $link_text == '' ) $link_text = T_('Log out');
 738      if( $link_title == '#' ) $link_title = T_('Log out from your account');
 739  
 740      $r = $before;
 741      $r .= '<a href="'.get_user_logout_url().'"';
 742      $r .= get_field_attribs_as_string( $params, false );
 743      $r .= ' title="'.$link_title.'">';
 744      $r .= sprintf( $link_text, $current_User->login );
 745      $r .= '</a>';
 746      $r .= $after;
 747      return $r;
 748  }

 751  /**
 752   * Get the URL for the logout button
 753   *
 754   * @param integer blog ID for the requested blog. NULL for current $Blog
 755   * @return string
 756   */
 757  function get_user_logout_url( $blog_ID = NULL )
 758  {
 759      global $admin_url, $baseurl, $is_admin_page, $secure_htsrv_url;
 760  
 761      if( ! is_logged_in() )
 762      {
 763          return false;
 764      }
 765  
 766      $redirect_to = url_rel_to_same_host( regenerate_url( 'disp,action','','','&' ), $secure_htsrv_url );
 767      if( require_login( $redirect_to, true ) )
 768      { // if redirect_to page is a login page, or also require login ( e.g. admin.php )
 769          if( ! empty( $blog_ID ) )
 770          { // Try to use blog by defined ID
 771              $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
 772              $current_Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID, false, false );
 773          }
 774          if( empty( $current_Blog ) )
 775          { // Use current blog
 776              global $Blog;
 777              $current_Blog = & $Blog;
 778          }
 779  
 780          if( ! empty( $current_Blog ) )
 781          { // Blog is set
 782              // set redirect_to to Blog url
 783              $redirect_to = $current_Blog->gen_blogurl();
 784          }
 785          else
 786          { // Blog is empty, set abort url to baseurl
 787              $redirect_to =  url_rel_to_same_host( $baseurl, $secure_htsrv_url );
 788          }
 789      }
 790  
 791      return $secure_htsrv_url.'login.php?action=logout&amp;redirect_to='.rawurlencode($redirect_to);
 792  }

 812  /**
 813   * Template tag: Get a link to the backoffice.
 814   *
 815   * Usually provided in skins in order for newbies to find the admin interface more easily...
 816   *
 817   * @param string To be displayed before the link.
 818   * @param string To be displayed after the link.
 819   * @param string The page/controller to link to inside of {@link $admin_url}
 820   * @param string Text for the link.
 821   * @param string Title for the link.
 822   * @return string
 823   */
 824  function get_user_admin_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '', $link_title = '#', $not_visible = '' )
 825  {
 826      global $admin_url, $blog, $current_User;
 827  
 828      if( is_logged_in() && ! $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'normal' ) )
 829      { // If user should NOT see admin link:
 830          return $not_visible;
 831      }
 832  
 833      if( $link_text == '' ) $link_text = T_('Admin');
 834      if( $link_title == '#' ) $link_title = T_('Go to the back-office...');
 835      // add the blog param to $page if it is not already in there
 836  
 837      if( !empty( $blog ) )
 838      {
 839          $url = url_add_param( $admin_url, 'blog='.$blog );
 840      }
 841      else
 842      {
 843          $url = $admin_url;
 844      }
 845  
 846      $r = $before;
 847      $r .= '<a href="'.$url.'" title="'.$link_title.'">';
 848      $r .= $link_text;
 849      $r .= '</a>';
 850      $r .= $after;
 851      return $r;
 852  }

1032  /**
1033   * Get User identity link. User is given with his login or ID. User login or ID must be set.
1034   *
1035   * @param string User login ( can be NULL if ID is set )
1036   * @param integer User ID ( can be NULL if login is set )
1037   * @param string On which user profile tab should this link point to
1038   * @param string What display as link text: avatar_name | avatar_login | only_avatar | name | login | nickname | firstname | lastname | fullname | preferredname
1039   * @return NULL|string NULL if this user or the profile tab doesn't exists, the identity link otherwise.
1040   */
1041  function get_user_identity_link( $user_login, $user_ID = NULL, $profile_tab = 'profile', $link_text = 'avatar' )
1042  {
1043      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
1044  
1045      if( empty( $user_login ) )
1046      {
1047          $User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
1048          if( !$User )
1049          { // user with given user_ID doesn't exist
1050              return NULL;
1051          }
1052      }
1053      else
1054      {
1055          $User = & $UserCache->get_by_login( $user_login );
1056      }
1057  
1058      if( $User == false )
1059      {
1060          return NULL;
1061      }
1062  
1063      return $User->get_identity_link( array( 'profile_tab' => $profile_tab, 'link_text' => $link_text ) );
1064  }
1065  
1066  
1067  /**
1068   * Get the available user display url
1069   *
1070   * @param integer User ID
1071   * @param string Name of user tab in backoffice ( values: profile, avatar, pwdchange, userprefs, advanced, admin, blogs,
1072   *               'userpage' to get url of frontoffice )
1073   * @param integer|NULL Blog ID or NULL to use current blog
1074   * @return string Url
1075   */
1076  function get_user_identity_url( $user_ID, $user_tab = 'profile', $blog_ID = NULL )
1077  {
1078      global $current_User, $Settings;
1079  
1080      if( $user_ID == NULL )
1081      {
1082          return NULL;
1083      }
1084  
1085      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
1086      $User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false );
1087  
1088      if( empty( $User ) )
1089      {
1090          return NULL;
1091      }
1092  
1093      if( !$User->check_status( 'can_display_link' ) && !( is_admin_page() && is_logged_in( false ) && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) ) )
1094      { // if the account status restrict to display user profile link and current User is not an admin in admin interface, then do not return identity url!
1095          return NULL;
1096      }
1097  
1098      if( !is_logged_in() || $user_tab == 'userpage' )
1099      { // user is not logged in
1100          return $User->get_userpage_url( $blog_ID );
1101      }
1102  
1103      if( has_cross_country_restriction( 'users', 'profile' ) && ( $current_User->ctry_ID !== $User->ctry_ID ) )
1104      { // if the current user cannot view the profiles from other countries
1105          return NULL;
1106      }
1107  
1108      if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'user', 'view', false, $User ) )
1109      { // if the current user status restrict to view other user profile
1110          return NULL;
1111      }
1112  
1113      if( !is_admin_page() )
1114      { // can't display the profile form, display the front office User form
1115          return $User->get_userpage_url( $blog_ID );
1116      }
1117  
1118      if( $current_User->check_status( 'can_access_admin' ) && ( ( $current_User->ID == $user_ID ) || $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'view' ) ) )
1119      {    // Go to backoffice profile:
1120          return get_user_settings_url( $user_tab, $user_ID, $blog_ID );
1121      }
1122  
1123      // can't show anything:
1124      return NULL;
1125  }
1126  
1127  
1128  /**
1129   * Get URL to a specific user settings tab (profile, avatar, pwdchange, userprefs)
1130   *
1131   * @param string user tab
1132   * @param integer user ID for the requested user. If isn't set then return $current_User settings url.
1133   * @param integer blog ID for the requested blog. NULL for current $Blog
1134   * @return string URL
1135   */
1136  function get_user_settings_url( $user_tab, $user_ID = NULL, $blog_ID = NULL )
1137  {
1138      global $current_User, $is_admin_page, $admin_url, $ReqURI;
1139  
1140      if( !is_logged_in() )
1141      {
1142          debug_die( 'Active user not found.' );
1143      }
1144  
1145      if( in_array( $user_tab, array( 'advanced', 'admin', 'sessions', 'activity' ) ) )
1146      {
1147          $is_admin_tab = true;
1148      }
1149      else
1150      {
1151          $is_admin_tab = false;
1152      }
1153  
1154      if( ( !$is_admin_tab ) && ( ! in_array( $user_tab, array( 'profile', 'user', 'avatar', 'pwdchange', 'userprefs', 'subs', 'report' ) ) ) )
1155      {
1156          debug_die( 'Not supported user tab!' );
1157      }
1158  
1159      if( $user_ID == NULL )
1160      {
1161          $user_ID = $current_User->ID;
1162      }
1163  
1164      if( ! empty( $blog_ID ) )
1165      { // Try to use blog by defined ID
1166          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
1167          $current_Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID, false, false );
1168      }
1169      if( empty( $current_Blog ) )
1170      { // Use current blog
1171          global $Blog;
1172          $current_Blog = & $Blog;
1173      }
1174  
1175      if( empty( $current_Blog ) )
1176      { // Use base url when current blog is not defined yet
1177          global $baseurl;
1178          $blog_url = $baseurl;
1179      }
1180      else
1181      { // Use home page of the current blog
1182          $blog_url = $current_Blog->gen_blogurl();
1183      }
1184  
1185      if( $is_admin_page || $is_admin_tab || empty( $current_Blog ) || $current_User->ID != $user_ID )
1186      {
1187          if( ( $current_User->ID != $user_ID && ! $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'view' ) ) ||
1188              ( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'restricted' ) || ! $current_User->check_status( 'can_access_admin' ) ) )
1189          { // Use blog url when user has no access to backoffice 
1190              if( empty( $current_Blog ) )
1191              { // Check if system has at least one blog
1192                  $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
1193                  $BlogCache->clear();
1194                  $blog_cache_SQL = $BlogCache->get_SQL_object();
1195                  $blog_cache_SQL->LIMIT( 1 );
1196                  $BlogCache->load_by_sql( $blog_cache_SQL );
1197                  if( count( $BlogCache->cache ) > 0 )
1198                  {
1199                      if( $current_Blog = & $BlogCache->get_next() )
1200                      {
1201                          $blog_url = $current_Blog->gen_blogurl();
1202                      }
1203                  }
1204              }
1205  
1206              if( ! empty( $current_Blog ) )
1207              { // We should use blog url when at least one blog exist 
1208                  if( $is_admin_tab )
1209                  { // Deny all admin tabs for such users
1210                      $user_tab = 'user';
1211                  }
1212                  if( in_array( $user_tab, array( 'profile', 'avatar', 'pwdchange', 'userprefs', 'subs' ) ) )
1213                  {
1214                      return $current_Blog->get( $user_tab.'url' );
1215                  }
1216                  else
1217                  {
1218                      return url_add_param( $blog_url, 'disp='.$user_tab );
1219                  }
1220              }
1221              else
1222              { // No blogs exist in system
1223                  return NULL;
1224              }
1225          }
1226          if( ( $user_tab == 'admin' ) && ( $current_User->grp_ID != 1 ) )
1227          { // Only users of the first group can use the admin tab
1228              $user_tab = 'profile';
1229          }
1230          return $admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;user_tab='.$user_tab.'&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID;
1231      }
1232  
1233      if( ! empty( $current_Blog ) && in_array( $user_tab, array( 'profile', 'avatar', 'pwdchange', 'userprefs', 'subs' ) ) )
1234      {
1235          return $current_Blog->get( $user_tab.'url' );
1236      }
1237      else
1238      {
1239          return url_add_param( $blog_url, 'disp='.$user_tab );
1240      }
1241  }

1245   * Template tag: Display a link to messaging module
1246   */
1247  function user_messaging_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '#', $link_title = '#', $show_badge = false )
1248  {
1249      echo get_user_messaging_link( $before, $after, $link_text, $link_title );
1250  }
1251  
1252  
1253  /**
1254   * Template tag: Get a link to messaging module
1255   *
1256   * @return string|false
1257   */
1258  function get_user_messaging_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '#', $link_title = '#', $show_badge = false )
1259  {
1260      global $unread_messages_count;
1261  
1262      $user_messaging_url = get_user_messaging_url();
1263  
1264      if( !$user_messaging_url )
1265      {    // Messages link is not available
1266          return false;
1267      }
1268  
1269      if( $link_text == '#' )
1270      {
1271          $link_text = T_('Messages');
1272      }
1273  
1274      if( $link_title == '#' )
1275      {
1276          $link_title = T_('Messages');
1277      }
1278  
1279      $badge = '';
1280      if( $show_badge && $unread_messages_count > 0 )
1281      {
1282          $badge = ' <span class="badge">'.$unread_messages_count.'</span>';
1283      }
1284  
1285      $r = $before
1286          .'<a href="'.$user_messaging_url.'" title="'.$link_title.'">'
1287          .$link_text
1288          .'</a>'
1289          .$badge
1290          .$after;
1291  
1292      return $r;
1293  }

1297   * Get URL to messaging module
1298   */
1299  function get_user_messaging_url()
1300  {
1301      global $current_User, $Blog;
1302  
1303      if( !is_logged_in() )
1304      {
1305          return false;
1306      }
1307  
1308      if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'perm_messaging', 'reply' ) )
1309      {    // No minimum permissions for messaging module
1310          return false;
1311      }
1312  
1313      return get_dispctrl_url( 'threads' );
1314  }

1326  /**
1327   * Template tag: Get a link to user contacts
1328   *
1329   * @return string|false
1330   */
1331  function get_user_contacts_link( $before = '', $after = '', $link_text = '#', $link_title = '#' )
1332  {
1333      $user_contacts_url = get_user_contacts_url();
1334  
1335      if( !$user_contacts_url )
1336      {    // Messages link is not available
1337          return false;
1338      }
1339  
1340      if( $link_text == '#' )
1341      {
1342          $link_text = T_('Messages');
1343      }
1344  
1345      if( $link_title == '#' )
1346      {
1347          $link_title = T_('Messages');
1348      }
1349  
1350      $r = $before
1351          .'<a href="'.$user_contacts_url.'" title="'.$link_title.'">'
1352          .$link_text
1353          .'</a>'
1354          .$after;
1355  
1356      return $r;
1357  }

1405  
1406  /**
1407   * Check profile parameters and add errors through {@link param_error()}.
1408   *
1409   * @param array associative array.
1410   *     Either array( $value, $input_name ) or just $value;
1411   *     ($input_name gets used for associating it to a form fieldname)
1412   *     - 'invitation': check for non-empty when users can register ONLY with an Invitation code/link
1413   *     - 'login': check for non-empty
1414   *     - 'nickname': check for non-empty
1415   *     - 'icq': must be a number
1416   *     - 'email': mandatory, must be well formed
1417   *     - 'country': check for non-empty
1418   *     - 'firstname': check for non-empty
1419   *     - 'lastname': check for non-empty
1420   *     - 'url': must be well formed, in allowed scheme, not blacklisted
1421   *     - 'pass1' / 'pass2': passwords (twice), must be the same and not == login (if given)
1422   *     - 'pass_required': false/true (default is true)
1423   * @param User|NULL A user to use for additional checks (password != login/nick).
1424   */
1425  function profile_check_params( $params, $User = NULL )
1426  {
1427      global $Messages, $Settings, $dummy_fields;
1428  
1429      foreach( $params as $k => $v )
1430      {
1431          // normalize params:
1432          if( $k != 'pass_required' && ! is_array( $v ) )
1433          {
1434              $params[ $k ] = array( $v, $k );
1435          }
1436      }
1437  
1438      // checking invitation code:
1439      if( isset( $params['invitation'][0] ) )
1440      {
1441          if( empty( $params['invitation'][0] ) )
1442          { // invitation code can't be empty
1443              param_error( $params['invitation'][1], T_('Please enter your invitation code.') );
1444          }
1445      }
1446  
1447      // checking login has been typed:
1448      if( isset( $params['login'][0] ) )
1449      {
1450          if( empty( $params['login'][0] ) )
1451          { // login can't be empty
1452              param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['login'][1] ], T_('Please enter your login.') );
1453          }
1454          else
1455          {
1456              param_check_valid_login( $dummy_fields[ $params['login'][1] ] );
1457          }
1458      }
1459  
1460      // checking e-mail address
1461      if( isset( $params['email'][0] ) )
1462      {
1463          if( empty( $params['email'][0] ) )
1464          {
1465              param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['email'][1] ], T_('Please enter your e-mail address.') );
1466          }
1467          elseif( ! is_email( $params['email'][0] ) )
1468          {
1469              param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['email'][1] ], T_('The email address is invalid.') );
1470          }
1471      }
1472  
1473      // Checking country
1474      if( isset( $params['country'] ) && empty( $params['country'][0] ) )
1475      {
1476          param_error( $params['country'][1], T_('Please select country.') );
1477      }
1478  
1479      // Checking first name
1480      if( isset( $params['firstname'] ) && empty( $params['firstname'][0] ) )
1481      {
1482          param_error( $params['firstname'][1], T_('Please enter your first name.') );
1483      }
1484  
1485      // Checking last name
1486      if( isset( $params['lastname'] ) && empty( $params['lastname'][0] ) )
1487      {
1488          param_error( $params['lastname'][1], T_('Please enter your last name.') );
1489      }
1490  
1491      // Checking gender
1492      if( isset( $params['gender'] ) )
1493      {
1494          if( empty( $params['gender'][0] ) )
1495          {
1496              param_error( $params['gender'][1], T_('Please select gender.') );
1497          }
1498          elseif( ( $params['gender'][0] != 'M' ) && ( $params['gender'][0] != 'F' ) )
1499          {
1500              param_error( $params['gender'][1], 'Gender value is invalid' );
1501          }
1502      }
1503  
1504      // Checking URL:
1505      if( isset( $params['url'] ) )
1506      {
1507          if( $error = validate_url( $params['url'][0], 'commenting' ) )
1508          {
1509              param_error( $params['url'][1], T_('Supplied URL is invalid: ').$error );
1510          }
1511      }
1512  
1513      // Check passwords:
1514  
1515      $pass_required = isset( $params['pass_required'] ) ? $params['pass_required'] : true;
1516  
1517      if( isset( $params['pass1'][0] ) && isset( $params['pass2'][0] ) )
1518      {
1519          if( $pass_required || ! empty( $params['pass1'][0] ) || ! empty( $params['pass2'][0] ) )
1520          { // Password is required or was given
1521              // checking the password has been typed twice
1522              if( empty( $params['pass1'][0] ) || empty( $params['pass2'][0] ) )
1523              {
1524                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass2'][1] ], T_('Please enter your password twice.') );
1525              }
1526  
1527              // checking the password has been typed twice the same:
1528              if( $params['pass1'][0] !== $params['pass2'][0] )
1529              {
1530                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], T_('You typed two different passwords.') );
1531              }
1532              elseif( $Settings->get('passwd_special') && ! preg_match( '~[\x20-\x2f\x3a-\x40\x5b-\x60\x7b-\x7f]~', $params['pass1'][0] ) )
1533              {
1534                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], T_('Your password should contain at least one special character (like & ! $ * - _ + etc.)') );
1535              }
1536              elseif( utf8_strlen( $params['pass1'][0] ) < $Settings->get( 'user_minpwdlen' ) )
1537              {
1538                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], sprintf( T_('The minimum password length is %d characters.'), $Settings->get( 'user_minpwdlen' ) ) );
1539              }
1540              elseif( isset( $User ) && $params['pass1'][0] == $User->get( 'login' ) )
1541              {
1542                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], T_('The password must be different from your login.') );
1543              }
1544              elseif( isset( $User ) && $params['pass1'][0] == $User->get( 'nickname' ) )
1545              {
1546                  param_error( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], T_('The password must be different from your nickname.') );
1547              }
1548              elseif( preg_match( '/[<>&]/', $_POST[ $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ] ] ) )
1549              { // Checking the not allowed chars
1550                  param_error_multiple( array( $dummy_fields[ $params['pass1'][1] ], $dummy_fields[ $params['pass2'][1] ] ), T_('Passwords cannot contain the characters &lt;, &gt; and &amp;.') );
1551              }
1552          }
1553      }
1554  }
1555  
1556  
1557  /**
1558   * Get avatar <img> tag by user login
1559   *
1560   * @param string user login
1561   * @param boolean if true show user preferred name after avatar, if 'login' show user login
1562   * @param boolean if true link to user profile
1563   * @param string avatar size
1564   * @param string style class of image
1565   * @param string image align
1566   * @param string avatar overlay text
1567   * @param string style class of link
1568   * @param boolean if true show user avatar
1569   * @param string Value for html attribute, NULL - to use default to init bubbletip on mouseover
1570   * @return login <img> tag
1571   */
1572  function get_avatar_imgtag( $user_login, $show_login = true, $link = true, $size = 'crop-top-15x15', $img_class = 'avatar_before_login', $align = '', $avatar_overlay_text = '', $link_class = '', $show_avatar = true, $rel = NULL )
1573  {
1574      global $current_User;
1575  
1576      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
1577      $User = & $UserCache->get_by_login( $user_login );
1578  
1579      if( $User === false )
1580      {
1581          return '';
1582      }
1583  
1584      $img_tag = '';
1585      if( $show_avatar )
1586      { // Get user avatar
1587          $img_tag = $User->get_avatar_imgtag( $size, $img_class, $align, false, $avatar_overlay_text );
1588      }
1589  
1590      $login_class = '';
1591      if( ! empty( $show_login ) )
1592      { // Dsiplay user login or preffered name
1593          $login = ( $show_login === 'login' ? $User->login : $User->get_username() );
1594          // Add class "login" to detect logins by js plugins
1595          $login_class = ( $login == $User->login ? 'login ' : '' );
1596          $img_tag = '<span class="nowrap">'.$img_tag.'<b>'.$login.'</b></span>';
1597      }
1598  
1599      if( is_null( $rel ) )
1600      { // Set default rel:
1601          $rel = 'bubbletip_user_'.$User->ID;
1602      }
1603  
1604      if( ! empty( $rel ) )
1605      { // Initialize attribure "rel"
1606          $rel = ' rel="'.$rel.'"';
1607      }
1608  
1609      $identity_url = get_user_identity_url( $User->ID );
1610      if( empty( $identity_url ) )
1611      { // Current user has not permissions to view other user profile
1612          $img_tag = '<span class="'.$login_class.$User->get_gender_class().'"'.$rel.'>'.$img_tag.'</span>';
1613      }
1614      else if( !empty( $img_tag ) )
1615      { // Show avatar & user login as link to the profile page
1616          $link_class = ( $link_class != '' ) ? ' '.$link_class : '';
1617          $img_tag = '<a href="'.$identity_url.'" class="'.$login_class.$User->get_gender_class().$link_class.'"'.$rel.'>'.$img_tag.'</a>';
1618      }
1619  
1620      return $img_tag;
1621  }
1622  
1623  
1624  /**
1625   * Get avatar <img> tags for list of user logins
1626   *
1627   * @param list of user logins
1628   * @param if true show user login after each avatar
1629   * @param avatar size
1630   * @param style class
1631   * @param image align
1632   * @param mixed read status, Set icon of the read status, 'left'/'left_message' - if user has left the conversation ( left messsage will display different title ), TRUE - users have seen message, FALSE - users have not seen the message
1633   *              leave it on NULL - to not display read status icon
1634   * @param if true show user avatar
1635   * @param separator between users
1636   * @param boolean set true to also show deleted users with 'Deleted user' label
1637   * @return coma separated login <img> tag
1638   */
1639  function get_avatar_imgtags( $user_logins_list, $show_login = true, $link = true, $size = 'crop-top-15x15', $class = 'avatar_before_login', $align = '', $read_status = NULL, $show_avatar = true, $separator = '<br />', $show_deleted_users = false )
1640  {
1641      if( !is_array( $user_logins_list ) )
1642      {
1643          $user_logins_list = explode( ', ', $user_logins_list );
1644      }
1645  
1646      $user_imgtags_list = array();
1647      foreach( $user_logins_list as $user_login )
1648      {
1649          $icon = '';
1650          if( ! is_null( $read_status ) )
1651          { // Add icon behind user login (read status)
1652              if( $read_status === 'left' )
1653              { // user has left the conversation
1654                  $icon = get_icon( 'bullet_black', 'imgtag', array( 'alt' => sprintf( T_('%s has left this conversation.'), $user_login ), 'style' => 'margin:1px 4px' ) );
1655              }
1656              elseif( $read_status === 'left_message' )
1657              { // user has left the conversation before this message
1658                  $icon = get_icon( 'bullet_black', 'imgtag', array( 'alt' => sprintf( T_('%s has left the conversation and has not received this message.'), $user_login ), 'style' => 'margin:1px 4px' ) );
1659              }
1660              elseif( $read_status )
1661              { // User has seen a message
1662                  $icon = get_icon( 'allowback', 'imgtag', array( 'alt' => sprintf( T_('%s has seen this message.'), $user_login ), 'style' => 'margin:0 2px' ) );
1663              }
1664              else
1665              { // User has not seen a message
1666                  $icon = get_icon( 'bullet_red', 'imgtag', array( 'alt' => sprintf( T_('%s has NOT seen this message yet.'), $user_login ), 'style' => 'margin:1px 4px' ) );
1667              }
1668          }
1669          if( empty( $user_login ) )
1670          { // user login is empty, we can't show avatar
1671              if( $show_deleted_users )
1672              { // show this users as deleted user
1673                  $user_imgtags_list[] = '<span class="nowrap">'.get_avatar_imgtag_default( $size, $class, $align ).'<span class="user deleted"><b>'.T_( 'Deleted user' ).'</b></span></span>';
1674              }
1675          }
1676          else
1677          {
1678              $user_imgtags_list[] = '<span class="nowrap">'.$icon.get_avatar_imgtag( $user_login, $show_login, $link, $size, $class, $align, '', '', $show_avatar ).'</span>';
1679          }
1680      }
1681      return implode( $separator, $user_imgtags_list );
1682  }
1683  
1684  
1685  /**
1686   * Get styled avatar
1687   *
1688   * @param integer user ID
1689   * @param array params
1690   * @return string
1691   */
1692  function get_user_avatar_styled( $user_ID, $params )
1693  {
1694      global $thumbnail_sizes;
1695  
1696      $params = array_merge( array(
1697              'block_class'  => 'avatar_rounded',
1698              'size'         => 'crop-top-64x64',
1699              'avatar_class' => 'avatar',
1700              'bubbletip'    => true,
1701          ), $params );
1702  
1703      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
1704      $User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
1705  
1706      if( $User )
1707      { // requested user exists
1708          return $User->get_avatar_styled( $params );
1709      }
1710  
1711      // user doesn't exists because it was deleted
1712      $bubbletip_param = '';
1713      if( $params['bubbletip'] )
1714      {    // Init bubbletip param
1715          $bubbletip_param = 'rel="bubbletip_user_'.$user_ID.'"';
1716      }
1717      $style_width = '';
1718      if( isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$params['size']] ) )
1719      {
1720          $style_width = ' style="width:'.$thumbnail_sizes[$params['size']][1].'px"';
1721      }
1722  
1723      $result = '<div class="'.$params['block_class'].'" '.$bubbletip_param.$style_width.'>'
1724               .get_avatar_imgtag_default( $params['size'], $params['avatar_class'] )
1725               .'<span class="user deleted">'.T_( 'Deleted user' ).'</span>'
1726               .'</div>';
1727      return $result;
1728  }
1729  
1730  
1731  /**
1732   * Get avatar <img> tag with default picture
1733   *
1734   * @param string Avatar size
1735   * @param string Style class of image
1736   * @param string Image align
1737   * @param array Params
1738   * @return string <img> tag
1739   */
1740  function get_avatar_imgtag_default( $size = 'crop-top-15x15', $class = '', $align = '', $params = array() )
1741  {
1742      global $Settings, $thumbnail_sizes;
1743  
1744      if( ! $Settings->get('allow_avatars') )
1745      { // Avatars are not allowed, Exit here
1746          return '';
1747      }
1748  
1749      // Default params:
1750      $params = array_merge( array(
1751              'email'    => '',
1752              'username' => '',
1753              'default'  => '',
1754              'gender'   => '', // M - Men; F - Female/Women; Empty string - Unknown gender
1755              'tag_size' => NULL, // Change size of the attributes "width" & "height".
1756                                  // Example: ( $tag_size = '160' ) => width="160" height="160"
1757                                  //          ( $tag_size = '160x320' ) => width="160" height="320"
1758                                  //          NULL - use real size
1759          ), $params );
1760  
1761      if( ! $Settings->get('use_gravatar') )
1762      { // Gravatars are not allowed, Use default avatars instead
1763          $img_url = get_default_avatar_url( $params['gender'], $size );
1764          $gravatar_width = isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$size] ) ? $thumbnail_sizes[$size][1] : '15';
1765          $gravatar_height = isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$size] ) ? $thumbnail_sizes[$size][2] : '15';
1766      }
1767      else
1768      { // Gravatars are enabled
1769          $default_gravatar = $Settings->get('default_gravatar');
1770  
1771          if( empty( $params['default'] ) )
1772          { // Set default gravatar
1773              if( $default_gravatar == 'b2evo' )
1774              { // Use gravatar from b2evo default avatar image
1775                  $params['default'] = get_default_avatar_url( $params['gender'] );
1776              }
1777              else
1778              { // Use a selected gravatar type
1779                  $params['default'] = $default_gravatar;
1780              }
1781          }
1782  
1783          if( empty( $img_url ) )
1784          {
1785              $img_url = '//www.gravatar.com/avatar/'.md5( $params['email'] );
1786              $gravatar_width = isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$size] ) ? $thumbnail_sizes[$size][1] : '15';
1787              $gravatar_height = $gravatar_width;
1788  
1789              $img_url_params = array();
1790              if( !empty( $params['rating'] ) )
1791              { // Rating
1792                  $img_url_params[] = 'rating='.$params['rating'];
1793              }
1794  
1795              if( !empty( $gravatar_width ) )
1796              { // Size
1797                  $img_url_params[] = 'size='.$gravatar_width;
1798              }
1799  
1800              if( !empty( $params['default'] ) )
1801              { // Type
1802                  $img_url_params[] = 'default='.urlencode( $params['default'] );
1803              }
1804  
1805              if( count( $img_url_params ) > 0 )
1806              { // Append url params to request gravatar
1807                  $img_url .= '?'.implode( '&', $img_url_params );
1808              }
1809          }
1810      }
1811  
1812      if( $params['tag_size'] !== NULL )
1813      { // Change tag size
1814          $tag_size = explode( 'x', $params['tag_size'] );
1815          $gravatar_width = $tag_size[0];
1816          $gravatar_height = empty( $tag_size[1] ) ? $tag_size[0] : $tag_size[1];
1817      }
1818      $img_params = array(
1819              'src'    => $img_url,
1820              'width'  => $gravatar_width,  // dh> NOTE: works with gravatar, check if extending
1821              'height' => $gravatar_height, // dh> NOTE: works with gravatar, check if extending
1822          );
1823  
1824      if( !empty( $params['username'] ) )
1825      { // Add alt & title
1826          $img_params['alt']   = $params['username'];
1827          $img_params['title'] = $params['username'];
1828      }
1829      if( !empty( $class ) )
1830      { // Add class
1831          $img_params['class'] = $class;
1832      }
1833      if( !empty( $align ) )
1834      { // Add align
1835          $img_params['align'] = $align;
1836      }
1837  
1838      return '<img'.get_field_attribs_as_string( $img_params ).' />';
1839  }
1840  
1841  
1842  /**
1843   * Get a default avatar url depending on user gender
1844   *
1845   * @param string User gender: M - Men; F - Female/Women; Empty string - Unknown gender
1846   * @param string|NULL Avatar thumbnail size or NULL to get real image
1847   * @return string URL of avatar
1848   */
1849  function get_default_avatar_url( $gender = '', $size = NULL )
1850  {
1851      switch( $gender )
1852      {
1853          case 'M':
1854              // Default avatar for men
1855              $avatar_url = '/avatars/default_avatar_men.jpg';
1856              break;
1857  
1858          case 'F':
1859              // Default avatar for women
1860              $avatar_url = '/avatars/default_avatar_women.jpg';
1861              break;
1862  
1863          default:
1864              // Default avatar for users without defined gender
1865              $avatar_url = '/avatars/default_avatar_unknown.jpg';
1866              break;
1867      }
1868  
1869      if( $size !== NULL )
1870      { // Get a thumbnail url
1871          $FileCache = & get_FileCache();
1872          if( $File = & $FileCache->get_by_root_and_path( 'shared', 0, $avatar_url ) )
1873          {
1874              if( $File->is_image() )
1875              { // Check if the default avatar files are real images and not broken by some reason
1876                  return $File->get_thumb_url( $size, '&' );
1877              }
1878          }
1879      }
1880  
1881      // We couldn't get a thumbnail url OR access the folder, Return the full size image URL without further ado:
1882      global $media_url;
1883      return $media_url.'shared/global'.$avatar_url;
1884  }

1886  
1887  /**
1888   * Convert seconds to months, days, hours, minutes and seconds format
1889   *
1890   * @param integer seconds
1891   * @return string
1892   */
1893  function duration_format( $duration, $show_seconds = true )
1894  {
1895      $result = '';
1896  
1897      $fields = get_duration_fields( $duration );
1898      if( $fields[ 'months' ] > 0 )
1899      {
1900          $result .= sprintf( T_( '%d months' ), $fields[ 'months' ] ).' ';
1901      }
1902      if( $fields[ 'days' ] > 0 )
1903      {
1904          $result .= sprintf( T_( '%d days' ), $fields[ 'days' ] ).' ';
1905      }
1906      if( $fields[ 'hours' ] > 0 )
1907      {
1908          $result .= sprintf( T_( '%d hours' ), $fields[ 'hours' ] ).' ';
1909      }
1910      if( $fields[ 'minutes' ] > 0 )
1911      {
1912          $result .= sprintf( T_( '%d minutes' ), $fields[ 'minutes' ] ).' ';
1913      }
1914      if( $show_seconds && ( $fields[ 'seconds' ] > 0 ) )
1915      {
1916          $result .= sprintf( T_( '%d seconds' ),  $fields[ 'seconds' ] );
1917      }
1918  
1919      $result = trim( $result );
1920      if( empty( $result ) )
1921      {
1922          $result = '0';
1923      }
1924  
1925      return $result;
1926  }

1928  
1929  /**
1930   * Get the integer value of a status permission
1931   * The status permissions are stored as a set, and each status has an integer value also
1932   *
1933   * @param string status
1934   * @return integer status perm value
1935   */
1936  function get_status_permvalue( $status )
1937  {
1938      static $status_permission_map = array(
1939              'trash'      => 0, // Note that 'trash' status doesn't have a real permission value, with this value no-one has permission, and that is OK
1940              'review'     => 1,
1941              'draft'      => 2,
1942              'private'    => 4,
1943              'protected'  => 8,
1944              'deprecated' => 16,
1945              'community'  => 32,
1946              'published'  => 64,
1947              'redirected' => 128
1948          );
1949  
1950      switch( $status )
1951      {
1952          case 'published_statuses':
1953              return $status_permission_map['protected'] + $status_permission_map['community'] + $status_permission_map['published'];
1954  
1955          default:
1956              break;
1957      }
1958  
1959      if( !isset( $status_permission_map[$status] ) )
1960      {
1961          debug_die( 'Invalid status permvalue was requested!' );
1962      }
1963  
1964      return $status_permission_map[$status];
1965  }

1968  /**
1969   * Load current_User post read statuses
1970   *
1971   * @param array Load only for posts with these ids
1972   */
1973  function load_user_read_statuses( $post_ids = NULL )
1974  {
1975      global $DB, $current_User, $user_post_read_statuses;
1976  
1977      if( !is_logged_in() )
1978      { // There are no logged in user
1979          return;
1980      }
1981  
1982      if( !empty( $user_post_read_statuses ) )
1983      { // User read statuses were already set
1984          return;
1985      }
1986      else
1987      { // Init with an empty array
1988          $user_post_read_statuses = array();
1989      }
1990  
1991      $post_condition = empty( $post_ids ) ? NULL : 'uprs_post_ID IN ( '.implode( ',', $post_ids ).' )';
1992  
1993      // SELECT current User's post and comment read statuses for all post with the given ids
1994      $SQL = new SQL();
1995      $SQL->SELECT( 'uprs_post_ID, uprs_read_post_ts' );
1996      $SQL->FROM( 'T_users__postreadstatus' );
1997      $SQL->WHERE( 'uprs_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $current_User->ID ) );
1998      $SQL->WHERE_and( $post_condition );
1999      // Set those post read statuses which were opened before:
2000      $user_post_read_statuses = $DB->get_assoc( $SQL->get() );
2001  
2002      if( empty( $post_ids ) )
2003      { // The load was not requested for specific posts, so we have loaded all information what we have, ther rest of the posts were not read by this user
2004          return;
2005      }
2006  
2007      // Set new posts read statuses
2008      foreach( $post_ids as $post_ID )
2009      { // Make sure to set read statuses for each requested post ID
2010          if( ! isset( $user_post_read_statuses[ $post_ID ] ) )
2011          { // Set each read status to 0
2012              $user_post_read_statuses[ $post_ID ] = 0;
2013          }
2014      }
2015  }

2018  /**
2019   * Load blog advanced User/Group permission
2020   *
2021   * @param array the array what should be loaded with the permission values ( it should be the User or Group blog_post_statuses array )
2022   * @param integer the target blog ID
2023   * @param integer the target User or Group ID
2024   * @param string the prefix which must be bloguser or bloggroup depends from where we call this fucntion
2025   * @return boolean true on success, false on failure
2026   */
2027  function load_blog_advanced_perms( & $blog_perms, $perm_target_blog, $perm_target_ID, $prefix )
2028  {
2029      global $DB;
2030  
2031      $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
2032      /**
2033       * @var Blog
2034       */
2035      $Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $perm_target_blog );
2036      if( ! $Blog->advanced_perms )
2037      { // We do not abide to advanced perms
2038          return false;
2039      }
2040  
2041      if( empty( $perm_target_ID ) )
2042      { // Target object is not in DB, nothing to load!:
2043          return false;
2044      }
2045  
2046      if( !empty( $blog_perms ) )
2047      { // perms are already loaded, don't load again
2048          return false;
2049      }
2050  
2051      switch( $prefix )
2052      {
2053          case 'bloguser':
2054              $table = 'T_coll_user_perms';
2055              $perm_target_key = 'bloguser_user_ID';
2056              break;
2057  
2058          case 'bloggroup':
2059              $table = 'T_coll_group_perms';
2060              $perm_target_key = 'bloggroup_group_ID';
2061              break;
2062  
2063          default:
2064              debug_die( 'Invalid call of load blog permission' );
2065      }
2066  
2067      // Load now:
2068      $query = '
2069          SELECT *, '.$prefix.'_perm_poststatuses + 0 as perm_poststatuses_bin, '.$prefix.'_perm_cmtstatuses + 0 as perm_cmtstatuses_bin
2070            FROM '.$table.'
2071           WHERE '.$prefix.'_blog_ID = '.$perm_target_blog.'
2072             AND '.$perm_target_key.' = '.$perm_target_ID;
2073      $row = $DB->get_row( $query, ARRAY_A );
2074  
2075      if( empty($row) )
2076      { // No rights set for this Blog - User/Group: remember this (in order not to have the same query next time)
2077          $blog_perms = array(
2078                  'blog_ismember' => '0',
2079                  'blog_can_be_assignee' => '0',
2080                  'blog_post_statuses' => 0,
2081                  'blog_item_type' => 'standard',
2082                  'blog_edit' => 'no',
2083                  'blog_del_post' => '0',
2084                  'blog_edit_ts' => '0',
2085                  'blog_edit_cmt' => 'no',
2086                  'blog_del_cmts' => '0',
2087                  'blog_recycle_owncmts' => '0',
2088                  'blog_vote_spam_comments' => '0',
2089                  'blog_cmt_statuses' => 0,
2090                  'blog_cats' => '0',
2091                  'blog_properties' => '0',
2092                  'blog_admin' => '0',
2093                  'blog_media_upload' => '0',
2094                  'blog_media_browse' => '0',
2095                  'blog_media_change' => '0',
2096              );
2097      }
2098      else
2099      { // OK, rights found:
2100          $blog_perms['blog_ismember'] = $row[$prefix.'_ismember'];
2101          $blog_perms['blog_can_be_assignee'] = $row[$prefix.'_can_be_assignee'];
2102  
2103          $blog_perms['blog_post_statuses'] = $row['perm_poststatuses_bin'];
2104          $blog_perms['blog_cmt_statuses'] = $row['perm_cmtstatuses_bin'];
2105  
2106          $blog_perms['blog_item_type'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_item_type'];
2107          $blog_perms['blog_edit'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_edit'];
2108          $blog_perms['blog_del_post'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_delpost'];
2109          $blog_perms['blog_edit_ts'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_edit_ts'];
2110          $blog_perms['blog_del_cmts'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_delcmts'];
2111          $blog_perms['blog_recycle_owncmts'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_recycle_owncmts'];
2112          $blog_perms['blog_vote_spam_comments'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_vote_spam_cmts'];
2113          $blog_perms['blog_edit_cmt'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_edit_cmt'];
2114          $blog_perms['blog_cats'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_cats'];
2115          $blog_perms['blog_properties'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_properties'];
2116          $blog_perms['blog_admin'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_admin'];
2117          $blog_perms['blog_media_upload'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_media_upload'];
2118          $blog_perms['blog_media_browse'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_media_browse'];
2119          $blog_perms['blog_media_change'] = $row[$prefix.'_perm_media_change'];
2120      }
2121  
2122      return true;
2123  }

2125  
2126  /**
2127   * Check blog advanced user/group permission
2128   *
2129   * @param array blog user or group advanced permission settings
2130   * @param integer the user ID for whow we are checking the permission
2131   * @param string permission name
2132   * @param string permission level
2133   * @param Object permission target which can be a Comment or an Item depends from the permission what we are checking
2134   * @return boolean true if checked User/Group has permission, false otherwise
2135   */
2136  function check_blog_advanced_perm( & $blog_perms, $user_ID, $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target = NULL )
2137  {
2138      if( empty( $blog_perms ) )
2139      {
2140          return false;
2141      }
2142  
2143      // Check if permission is granted:
2144      switch( $permname )
2145      {
2146          case 'stats':
2147              // Wiewing stats is the same perm as being authorized to edit properties: (TODO...)
2148              if( $permlevel == 'view' )
2149              {
2150                  return $blog_perms['blog_properties'];
2151              }
2152              // No other perm can be granted here (TODO...)
2153              return false;
2154  
2155          case 'blog_post_statuses':
2156              // We grant this permission only if user has rights to create posts with any status different then 'deprecated' or 'redirected'
2157              $deprecated_value = get_status_permvalue( 'deprecated' );
2158              $redirected_value = get_status_permvalue( 'redirected' );
2159              return ( ( ~ ( $deprecated_value + $redirected_value ) ) & $blog_perms['blog_post_statuses'] ) > 0;
2160  
2161          case 'blog_comment_statuses':
2162              // We grant this permission only if user has rights to create comments with any status different then 'deprecated'
2163              $deprecated_value = get_status_permvalue( 'deprecated' );
2164              return ( ( ~ $deprecated_value ) & $blog_perms['blog_cmt_statuses'] ) > 0;
2165  
2166          case 'blog_comments':
2167              $edit_permname = 'blog_edit_cmt';
2168              $perm = ( $blog_perms['blog_cmt_statuses'] > 0 );
2169              break;
2170  
2171          case 'blog_post!published':
2172          case 'blog_post!community':
2173          case 'blog_post!protected':
2174          case 'blog_post!private':
2175          case 'blog_post!review':
2176          case 'blog_post!draft':
2177          case 'blog_post!deprecated':
2178          case 'blog_post!redirected':
2179              // We want a specific post permission:
2180              $status = substr( $permname, 10 );
2181              $edit_permname = 'blog_edit';
2182              $perm_statuses_value = $blog_perms['blog_post_statuses'];
2183              if( !empty( $perm_target ) )
2184              {
2185                  $Item = & $perm_target;
2186                  $creator_user_ID = $Item->creator_user_ID;
2187              }
2188  
2189              $perm = $perm_statuses_value & get_status_permvalue( $status );
2190              break;
2191  
2192          case 'blog_comment!published':
2193          case 'blog_comment!community':
2194          case 'blog_comment!protected':
2195          case 'blog_comment!private':
2196          case 'blog_comment!review':
2197          case 'blog_comment!draft':
2198          case 'blog_comment!deprecated':
2199              // We want a specific comment permission:
2200              $status = substr( $permname, 13 );
2201              $edit_permname = 'blog_edit_cmt';
2202              $perm_statuses_value = $blog_perms['blog_cmt_statuses'];
2203              if( !empty( $perm_target ) )
2204              {
2205                  $Comment = & $perm_target;
2206                  $creator_user_ID = $Comment->author_user_ID;
2207              }
2208  
2209              $perm = $perm_statuses_value & get_status_permvalue( $status );
2210              break;
2211  
2212          case 'files':
2213              switch( $permlevel )
2214              {
2215                  case 'add':
2216                      return $blog_perms['blog_media_upload'];
2217                  case 'view':
2218                      return $blog_perms['blog_media_browse'];
2219                  case 'edit':
2220                      return $blog_perms['blog_media_change'];
2221                  default:
2222                      return false;
2223              }
2224              break;
2225  
2226          case 'blog_edit':
2227          case 'blog_edit_cmt':
2228              if( $permlevel == 'no' )
2229              { // Doesn't make sensce to check that the user has at least 'no' permission
2230                  debug_die( 'Invalid edit pemlevel!' );
2231              }
2232              $edit_permvalue = $blog_perms[$permname];
2233              switch( $edit_permvalue )
2234              {
2235                  case 'all':
2236                      return true;
2237  
2238                  case 'le':
2239                      return $permlevel != 'all';
2240  
2241                  case 'lt':
2242                      return $permlevel != 'all' && $permlevel != 'le';
2243  
2244                  case 'anon':
2245                      return $permlevel == 'anon' || $permlevel == 'own';
2246  
2247                  case 'own':
2248                      return $permlevel == 'own';
2249  
2250                  default:
2251                      return false;
2252              }
2253  
2254          case 'blog_item_type_standard':
2255              // Standard item types are allowed for all
2256              return true;
2257          case 'blog_item_type_restricted':
2258              // Restricted item types - ONLY for admin and restricted permissions
2259              return ( $blog_perms['blog_item_type'] == 'admin' || $blog_perms['blog_item_type'] == 'restricted' );
2260          case 'blog_item_type_admin':
2261              // Admin item types - ONLY for admin permissions
2262              return ( $blog_perms['blog_item_type'] == 'admin' );
2263  
2264          default:
2265              return $blog_perms[$permname];
2266      }
2267  
2268      // TODO: the following probably should be handled by the Item class!
2269      if( $perm && ( $permlevel == 'edit' || $permlevel == 'moderate' )
2270          && ( !empty( $creator_user_ID ) || ( !empty( $Comment ) ) ) ) // Check if Comment is not empty because in case of comments authors may be empty ( anonymous users )
2271      {    // Can we edit this specific Item/Comment?
2272          $edit_permvalue = $blog_perms[$edit_permname];
2273          switch( $edit_permvalue )
2274          {
2275              case 'own': // Own posts/comments only:
2276                  return ( $creator_user_ID == $user_ID );
2277  
2278              case 'lt': // Own + Lower level posts only:
2279              case 'le': // Own + Lower or equal level posts only:
2280                  if( empty( $creator_user_ID ) || ( $creator_user_ID == $user_ID ) )
2281                  { // allow if the comment creator is not registered or it is the current User
2282                      return true;
2283                  }
2284                  $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
2285                  // Get creator User
2286                  $creator_User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $creator_user_ID, false, false );
2287                  // Get user for who we are checking this permission
2288                  $User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
2289                  return ( $creator_User && $User && ( $creator_User->level < $User->level || ( $edit_permvalue == 'le' && $creator_User->level == $User->level ) ) );
2290  
2291              case 'anon': // Anonymous comment or own comment ( This perm value may have only for comments )
2292                  return ( empty( $creator_user_ID ) || ( $creator_user_ID == $user_ID ) );
2293  
2294              case 'all':
2295                  return true;
2296  
2297              case 'no':
2298              default:
2299                  return false;
2300          }
2301      }
2302  
2303      if( $perm && $permlevel == 'edit' && empty( $creator_user_ID ) )
2304      {
2305          return $blog_perms[$edit_permname] != 'no';
2306      }
2307  
2308      if( $perm && $permlevel == 'moderate' && empty( $creator_user_ID ) )
2309      { // check moderator rights
2310          return in_array( $blog_perms[$edit_permname], array( 'anon', 'lt', 'le', 'all' ) );
2311      }
2312  
2313      return $perm;
2314  }
