2317  /**
2318   * Display user edit forms action icons
2319   *
2320   * @param object Widget(Form,Table,Results) where to display
2321   * @param objcet Edited User
2322   * @param string the action string, 'view' or 'edit'
2323   */
2324  function echo_user_actions( $Widget, $edited_User, $action )
2325  {
2326      global $current_User, $admin_url;
2327  
2328      if( $edited_User->ID != 0 )
2329      { // show these actions only if user already exists
2330          if( $current_User->ID != $edited_User->ID && $current_User->check_status( 'can_report_user' ) )
2331          {
2332              global $user_tab;
2333              // get current User report from edited User
2334              $current_report = get_report_from( $edited_User->ID );
2335              if( $current_report == NULL )
2336              { // Current user has no report for this user yet
2337                  $report_text_title = $report_text = T_('Report User');
2338              }
2339              else
2340              { // Current user already reported about this user
2341                  $report_text_title = $report_text = T_('You have reported this user');
2342                  $report_text = '<span class="red">'.$report_text.'</span>';
2343              }
2344              $Widget->global_icon( $report_text_title, 'warning_yellow', $admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=report&amp;user_ID='.$edited_User->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user'), ' '.$report_text, 3, 4, array( 'onclick' => 'return user_report( '.$edited_User->ID.', \''.( empty( $user_tab ) ? 'profile' : $user_tab ).'\')' ) );
2345          }
2346          if( ( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit', false ) ) && ( $current_User->ID != $edited_User->ID )
2347              && ( $edited_User->ID != 1 ) )
2348          {
2349              $Widget->global_icon( T_('Delete this user!'), 'delete', $admin_url.'?ctrl=users&amp;action=delete&amp;user_ID='.$edited_User->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user'), ' '.T_('Delete'), 3, 4  );
2350              $Widget->global_icon( T_('Delete this user as spammer!'), 'delete', $admin_url.'?ctrl=users&amp;action=delete&amp;deltype=spammer&amp;user_ID='.$edited_User->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user'), ' '.T_('Delete spammer'), 3, 4  );
2351          }
2352          if( $edited_User->get_msgform_possibility( $current_User ) )
2353          {
2354              $Widget->global_icon( T_('Compose message'), 'comments', $admin_url.'?ctrl=threads&action=new&user_login='.$edited_User->login );
2355          }
2356      }
2357  
2358      $redirect_to = get_param( 'redirect_to' );
2359      if( $redirect_to == NULL )
2360      {
2361          $redirect_to = regenerate_url( 'user_ID,action,ctrl,user_tab', 'ctrl=users' );
2362      }
2363      $Widget->global_icon( ( $action != 'view' ? T_('Cancel editing!') : T_('Close user profile!') ), 'close', $redirect_to );
2364  }

2367  /**
2368   * Get user menu sub entries
2369   *
2370   * @param boolean true to get admin interface user sub menu entries, false to get front office user sub menu entries
2371   * @param integer edited user ID
2372   * @return array user sub entries
2373   */
2374  function get_user_sub_entries( $is_admin, $user_ID )
2375  {
2376      global $current_User, $Settings, $Blog;
2377      $users_sub_entries = array();
2378      if( empty( $user_ID ) )
2379      {
2380          $user_ID = $current_User->ID;
2381      }
2382  
2383      if( $is_admin )
2384      {
2385          $ctrl_param = 'ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=';
2386          $user_param = '&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID;
2387          $base_url = '';
2388      }
2389      else
2390      {
2391          $ctrl_param = 'disp=';
2392          $user_param = '';
2393          $base_url = $Blog->gen_blogurl();
2394      }
2395      $edit_perm = ( $user_ID == $current_User->ID || $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) );
2396      $view_perm = ( $user_ID == $current_User->ID || $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'view' ) );
2397  
2398      if( $view_perm )
2399      {
2400          $users_sub_entries['profile'] = array(
2401                              'text' => T_('Profile'),
2402                              'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, $ctrl_param.'profile'.$user_param ) );
2403  
2404          if( $Settings->get('allow_avatars') )
2405          {
2406              $users_sub_entries['avatar'] = array(
2407                              'text' => T_('Profile picture'),
2408                              'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, $ctrl_param.'avatar'.$user_param ) );
2409          }
2410  
2411          if( $edit_perm )
2412          {
2413              $users_sub_entries['pwdchange'] = array(
2414                                  'text' => T_('Password'),
2415                                  'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, $ctrl_param.'pwdchange'.$user_param ) );
2416          }
2417  
2418          $users_sub_entries['userprefs'] = array(
2419                              'text' => T_('Preferences'),
2420                              'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, $ctrl_param.'userprefs'.$user_param ) );
2421  
2422          $users_sub_entries['subs'] = array(
2423                              'text' => T_('Notifications'),
2424                              'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, $ctrl_param.'subs'.$user_param ) );
2425  
2426          if( $is_admin )
2427          {    // show this only in backoffice
2428              $users_sub_entries['advanced'] = array(
2429                                  'text' => T_('Advanced'),
2430                                  'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, 'ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=advanced'.$user_param ) );
2431  
2432              if( $current_User->can_moderate_user( $user_ID ) )
2433              { // User have edit/delete all users permission, so this user is an administrator
2434                  $users_sub_entries['admin'] = array(
2435                                  'text' => T_('Admin'),
2436                                  'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, 'ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=admin'.$user_param ) );
2437  
2438                  // Only users with view/edit all users permission can see the 'Sessions' & 'User Activity' tabs
2439                  $users_sub_entries['sessions'] = array(
2440                                      'text' => T_('Sessions'),
2441                                      'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, 'ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=sessions'.$user_param ) );
2442  
2443                  $users_sub_entries['activity'] = array(
2444                                      'text' => $current_User->ID == $user_ID ? T_('My Activity') : T_('User Activity'),
2445                                      'href' => url_add_param( $base_url, 'ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=activity'.$user_param ) );
2446              }
2447          }
2448      }
2449  
2450      return $users_sub_entries;
2451  }

2454  /**
2455   * Get if user is subscribed to get emails, when a new comment is published on this item.
2456   *
2457   * @param integer user ID
2458   * @param integer item ID
2459   * @return boolean true if user is subscribed and false otherwise
2460   */
2461  function get_user_isubscription( $user_ID, $item_ID )
2462  {
2463      global $DB;
2464      $result = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT count( isub_user_ID )
2465                                  FROM T_items__subscriptions
2466                                  WHERE isub_user_ID = '.$user_ID.' AND isub_item_ID = '.$item_ID.' AND isub_comments <> 0' );
2467      return $result > 0;
2468  }

2471  /**
2472   * Set user item subscription
2473   *
2474   * @param integer user ID
2475   * @param integer item ID
2476   * @param integer value 0 for unsubscribe and 1 for subscribe
2477   * @return boolean true is new value was successfully set, false otherwise
2478   */
2479  function set_user_isubscription( $user_ID, $item_ID, $value )
2480  {
2481      global $DB;
2482      if( ( $value < 0 ) || ( $value > 1 ) )
2483      { // Invalid value. It should be 0 for unsubscribe and 1 for subscribe.
2484          return false;
2485      }
2486  
2487      return $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_items__subscriptions( isub_item_ID, isub_user_ID, isub_comments )
2488                                  VALUES ( '.$item_ID.', '.$user_ID.', '.$value.' )' );
2489  }

2494   *

2497   * @param string user tab title
2498   * @return string tab header

2500  function get_usertab_header( $edited_User, $user_tab, $user_tab_title )

2521      return '<div class="user_header">'.$result.'</div>'.'<div class="clear"></div>';

2525  /**
2526   * Check if user can receive new email today with the given email type or the limit was already exceeded
2527   *
2528   * @param string the name of limit/day setting
2529   * @param string the name of the last email setting
2530   * @param integer the user ID
2531   * @return integer/boolean Number of next email counter if new email is allowed, false otherwise
2532   */
2533  function check_allow_new_email( $limit_setting, $last_email_setting, $user_ID )
2534  {
2535      global $UserSettings, $servertimenow;
2536  
2537      if( empty( $UserSettings ) )
2538      {    // Initialize $UserSettings object (for example, it must be done when cron_exec.php is called in CLI mode):
2539          load_class( 'users/model/_usersettings.class.php', 'UserSettings' );
2540          $UserSettings = new UserSettings();
2541      }
2542  
2543      $limit = $UserSettings->get( $limit_setting, $user_ID );
2544      if( $limit == 0 )
2545      { // user doesn't allow this kind of emails at all
2546          return false;
2547      }
2548  
2549      $email_count = 0;
2550      $last_email = $UserSettings->get( $last_email_setting, $user_ID );
2551      if( !empty( $last_email ) )
2552      { // at least one email was sent
2553          $current_date = date( 'Y-m-d', $servertimenow );
2554          list( $last_email_ts, $last_email_count ) = explode( '_', $last_email );
2555          $last_date = date( 'Y-m-d', $last_email_ts );
2556          if( $last_date == $current_date )
2557          { // last email was sent today
2558              if( $last_email_count >= $limit )
2559              { // the limit was already reached
2560                  return false;
2561              }
2562              $email_count = $last_email_count;
2563          }
2564      }
2565  
2566      $email_count++;
2567  
2568      return $email_count;
2569  }
2570  
2571  
2572  /**
2573   * Update the counter of email sending of the user
2574   *
2575   * @param string the name of limit/day setting
2576   * @param string the name of the last email setting
2577   * @param integer the user ID
2578   * @return boolean true if email counter is updated, false otherwise
2579   */
2580  function update_user_email_counter( $limit_setting, $last_email_setting, $user_ID )
2581  {
2582      global $UserSettings, $servertimenow;
2583  
2584      $email_count = check_allow_new_email( $limit_setting, $last_email_setting, $user_ID );
2585      if( empty( $email_count ) )
2586      {
2587          return false;
2588      }
2589  
2590      // new email is allowed, set new email setting value, right now
2591      $last_email = $servertimenow.'_'.$email_count;
2592      $UserSettings->set( $last_email_setting, $last_email, $user_ID );
2593      return $UserSettings->dbupdate();
2594  }

2596  
2597  /**
2598   * Send account validation email with a permanent validation link
2599   *
2600   * @param array user ids to send validation email
2601   * @param boolean true if this email is an account activation reminder, false if the account status was changed right now
2602   * @return integer the number of successfully sent emails
2603   */
2604  function send_easy_validate_emails( $user_ids, $is_reminder = true, $email_changed = false )
2605  {
2606      global $UserSettings, $servertimenow, $secure_htsrv_url;
2607  
2608      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
2609  
2610      if( isset($GLOBALS['messaging_Module']) )
2611      {    // Get already received messages for each recepient user
2612          $already_received_messages = get_users_unread_threads( $user_ids );
2613      }
2614  
2615      $cache_by_locale = array();
2616      $email_sent = 0;
2617      foreach( $user_ids as $user_ID )
2618      { // Iterate through user ids and send account activation reminder to all user
2619          $User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false );
2620          if( !$User )
2621          { // user not exists
2622              continue;
2623          }
2624  
2625          if( !$User->check_status( 'can_be_validated' ) )
2626          { // User is validated or it is not allowed to be validated
2627              continue;
2628          }
2629  
2630          if( $is_reminder && ( !$UserSettings->get( 'send_activation_reminder' ) ) )
2631          { // This is an activation reminder, but user wouldn't like to receive this kind of emails
2632              continue;
2633          }
2634  
2635          if( mail_is_blocked( $User->get( 'email' ) ) )
2636          { // prevent trying to send an email to a blocked email address
2637              continue;
2638          }
2639  
2640          $notify_locale = $User->get( 'locale' );
2641          $reminder_key = $UserSettings->get( 'last_activation_reminder_key', $User->ID );
2642          if( empty( $reminder_key ) || $email_changed )
2643          { // reminder key was not generated yet, or the user email address was changed and we need a new one, to invalidate old requests
2644              $reminder_key = generate_random_key(32);
2645              $UserSettings->set( 'last_activation_reminder_key', $reminder_key, $User->ID );
2646          }
2647          if( ! isset($cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]) )
2648          { // No subject for this locale generated yet:
2649              locale_temp_switch( $notify_locale );
2650  
2651              $cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]['subject'] = T_( 'Activate your account: $login$' );
2652  
2653              locale_restore_previous();
2654          }
2655  
2656          $email_template_params = array(
2657                  'locale'       => $notify_locale,
2658                  'status'       => $User->get( 'status' ),
2659                  'reminder_key' => $reminder_key,
2660                  'is_reminder'  => $is_reminder,
2661              );
2662  
2663          if( !empty( $already_received_messages[$User->ID] ) )
2664          { // add already received message list to email body
2665              $email_template_params['already_received_messages'] = $already_received_messages[$User->ID];
2666          }
2667  
2668          // Update notification sender's info from General settings
2669          $User->update_sender( true );
2670  
2671          if( send_mail_to_User( $User->ID, $cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]['subject'], 'account_activate', $email_template_params, true ) )
2672          { // save corresponding user settings right after the email was sent, to prevent not saving if an eroor occurs
2673              $email_sent++;
2674              // Set last remind activation email date and increase sent reminder emails number in UserSettings
2675              $UserSettings->set( 'last_activation_email', date2mysql( $servertimenow ), $User->ID );
2676              if( $is_reminder )
2677              {
2678                  $reminder_sent_to_user = $UserSettings->get( 'activation_reminder_count', $User->ID );
2679                  $UserSettings->set( 'activation_reminder_count', $reminder_sent_to_user + 1, $User->ID );
2680              }
2681              $UserSettings->dbupdate();
2682          }
2683      }
2684  
2685      return $email_sent;
2686  }
2687  
2688  
2689  /**
2690   * Get account activation reminder informaton for the given user. This is used on the user admin settings form.
2691   *
2692   * @param $edited_User
2693   * @return array of arrays with field label, info and note about the Last and Next account activation emails
2694   */
2695  function get_account_activation_info( $edited_User )
2696  {
2697      global $Settings, $UserSettings, $servertimenow, $activate_account_reminder_config;
2698  
2699      $field_label = T_('Latest account activation email');
2700      $can_be_validated = $edited_User->check_status( 'can_be_validated' );
2701      if( ! $can_be_validated )
2702      {
2703          if( $edited_User->check_status( 'is_validated' ) )
2704          { // The user account is already activated
2705              return array( array( $field_label, T_('Account is already activated') ) );
2706          }
2707  
2708          if( $edited_User->check_status( 'is_closed' ) )
2709          {
2710              return array( array( $field_label, T_('The account is closed, it cannot be activated') ) );
2711          }
2712  
2713          debug_die('Unhandled user account status!');
2714      }
2715  
2716      if( ! $UserSettings->get( 'send_activation_reminder', $edited_User->ID ) )
2717      { // The user doesn't want to receive account activation reminders
2718          return array( array( $field_label, T_('This user doesn\'t want to receive account activation reminders') ) );
2719      }
2720  
2721      $field_note = '';
2722      $is_secure_validation = ( $Settings->get( 'validation_process' ) != 'easy' );
2723      if( $is_secure_validation )
2724      { // The easy validation process is not allowed, so account activation emails are sent only for request
2725          $field_note = T_('Account validation process is secured, so account activation emails are sent only upon request');
2726      }
2727  
2728      $result = array();
2729      $last_activation_email = $UserSettings->get( 'last_activation_email', $edited_User->ID );
2730      if( empty( $last_activation_email ) )
2731      { // latest activation email date is not set because email was not sent yet ( it is possuble that there is some problem with the user email address )
2732          $result[] = array( $field_label, T_('None yet'), $field_note );
2733      }
2734      else
2735      { // format last activation email date
2736          $last_activation_email_info = format_to_output( $last_activation_email );
2737          $result[] = array( $field_label, $last_activation_email_info, $field_note );
2738      }
2739  
2740      if( $is_secure_validation )
2741      { // When validation process is secure, then account activation email is not known, and this was already added as a note into the 'Last account activation email' field
2742          return $result;
2743      }
2744  
2745      $field_label = T_('Next account activation reminder');
2746      $number_of_max_reminders = ( count( $activate_account_reminder_config ) - 1 );
2747      $activation_reminder_count = (int) $UserSettings->get( 'activation_reminder_count', $edited_User->ID );
2748      $field_note = sprintf( T_('%d reminders were sent out of the maximum allowed of %d.'), $activation_reminder_count, $number_of_max_reminders );
2749      // The validation process is easy, so reminders should be sent
2750      $responsible_job_note = T_('Scheduled job responsible for reminders is "Send reminders about not activated accounts".');
2751  
2752      if( $edited_User->status == 'failedactivation' )
2753      { // The user account status was changed to failed activation, this user won't be reminded again to activate the account
2754          $result[] = array( $field_label, T_('Account activation has failed'), $field_note.' '.$responsible_job_note );
2755      }
2756      elseif( $activation_reminder_count >= $number_of_max_reminders )
2757      { // This is the case when the account status was not changed to failed activation yet, but the last reminder was sent
2758          $result[] = array( $field_label, sprintf( T_('We already sent %d account activation reminders of the maximum allowed of %d, no more reminders will be sent'), $activation_reminder_count, $number_of_max_reminders ) );
2759      }
2760      elseif( empty( $last_activation_email ) )
2761      { // Account activation email was not sent at all. This can happen when some problem is with the user email
2762          $result[] = array( $field_label, T_('At least one activation email should have been already sent. Check if the user email address is correct, and PHP is sending emails correctly'), $responsible_job_note );
2763      }
2764      else
2765      { // Activate account reminder email should be send to the user, set information when it should be done
2766          $next_activation_email_ts = strtotime( '+'.$activate_account_reminder_config[$activation_reminder_count].' second', strtotime( $last_activation_email ) );
2767          if( $next_activation_email_ts > $servertimenow )
2768          { // The next activation email issue date is in the future
2769              $time_left = seconds_to_period( $next_activation_email_ts - $servertimenow );
2770              $info = sprintf( T_('%s left before next notification').' - '.$field_note, $time_left );
2771              $result[] = array( $field_label, $info, $responsible_job_note );
2772          }
2773          else
2774          { // The next reminder issue date was in the past
2775              $time_since = seconds_to_period( $servertimenow - $next_activation_email_ts );
2776              $info = sprintf( T_('next notification pending since %s - check the "Send reminders about not activated accounts" scheduled job'), $time_since );
2777              $result[] = array( $field_label, $info, $field_note );
2778          }
2779      }
2780      return $result;
2781  }
2782  
2783  
2784  /**
2785   * Callback function to initialize a select element on the identity user form
2786   *
2787   * @param string Value
2788   * @return string Option elements for the select tag
2789   */
2790  function callback_options_user_new_fields( $value = 0 )
2791  {
2792      global $DB, $edited_User;
2793  
2794      $exclude_fields_sql = '';
2795      if( !empty( $edited_User ) )
2796      {    // Exclude not multiple fields for edited user
2797          $exclude_fields_sql = ' AND ( ufdf_duplicated != "forbidden" OR ufdf_required NOT IN ( "recommended", "require") )
2798              AND ufdf_ID NOT IN (
2799                  SELECT ufdf_ID
2800                    FROM T_users__fields
2801                    LEFT JOIN T_users__fielddefs ON ufdf_ID = uf_ufdf_ID
2802                   WHERE ufdf_duplicated = "forbidden"
2803                     AND uf_user_ID = "'.$edited_User->ID.'" )';
2804      }
2805  
2806      // Get list of possible field types:
2807      $userfielddefs = $DB->get_results( '
2808          SELECT ufdf_ID, ufdf_type, ufdf_name, ufgp_ID, ufgp_name, ufdf_suggest
2809            FROM T_users__fielddefs
2810            LEFT JOIN T_users__fieldgroups ON ufgp_ID = ufdf_ufgp_ID
2811           WHERE ufdf_required != "hidden"
2812             '.$exclude_fields_sql.'
2813           ORDER BY ufgp_order, ufdf_order' );
2814  
2815      $field_options = '';
2816  
2817      if( count( $userfielddefs ) > 0 )
2818      {    // Field types exist in DB
2819          global $user_fields_empty_name;
2820          $empty_name = isset( $user_fields_empty_name ) ? $user_fields_empty_name : T_('Add field...');
2821  
2822          $field_options .= '<option value="0">'.$empty_name.'</option>';
2823          $current_group_ID = 0;
2824          foreach( $userfielddefs as $f => $fielddef )
2825          {
2826              if( $fielddef->ufgp_ID != $current_group_ID )
2827              {    // New group
2828                  if( $f != 0 )
2829                  {    // Close tag of previous group
2830                      $field_options .= "\n".'</optgroup>';
2831                  }
2832                  $field_options .= "\n".'<optgroup label="'.$fielddef->ufgp_name.'">';
2833              }
2834              $field_options .= "\n".'<option value="'.$fielddef->ufdf_ID.'"';
2835              if( $value == $fielddef->ufdf_ID )
2836              {    // We had selected this type before getting an error:
2837                  $field_options .= ' selected="selected"';
2838              }
2839              if( $fielddef->ufdf_suggest )
2840              {    // We can suggest a values for this field type
2841                  $field_options .= ' rel="suggest"';
2842              }
2843              $field_options .= '>'.$fielddef->ufdf_name.'</option>';
2844              $current_group_ID = $fielddef->ufgp_ID;
2845          }
2846          $field_options .= "\n".'</optgroup>';
2847      }
2848  
2849      return $field_options;
2850  }
2851  
2852  
2853  /**
2854   * Display user fields from given array
2855   *
2856   * @param array User fields given from sql query with following structure:
2857   *                         ufdf_ID
2858   *                         uf_ID
2859   *                         ufdf_type
2860   *                         ufdf_name
2861   *                         uf_varchar
2862   *                         ufdf_required
2863   *                         ufdf_option
2864   * @param object Form
2865   * @param string Field name of the new fields ( new | add )
2866   * @param boolean Add a fieldset for group or don't
2867   */
2868  function userfields_display( $userfields, $Form, $new_field_name = 'new', $add_group_fieldset = true )
2869  {
2870      global $action;
2871  
2872      // Array contains values of the new fields from the request
2873      $uf_new_fields = param( 'uf_'.$new_field_name, 'array:array:string' );
2874  
2875      // Type of the new field
2876      global $new_field_type;
2877  
2878      $group_ID = 0;
2879      foreach( $userfields as $userfield )
2880      {
2881          if( empty( $userfield->ufgp_ID ) )
2882          {    // Don't display user field without group, because the user field definition was deleted from DB incorrectly:
2883              continue;
2884          }
2885  
2886          if( $group_ID !== $userfield->ufgp_ID && $add_group_fieldset )
2887          {    // Start new group
2888              if( $group_ID !== 0  )
2889              {    // End previous group
2890                  $Form->end_fieldset();
2891              }
2892              $Form->begin_fieldset( $userfield->ufgp_name.( is_admin_page() ? get_manual_link( 'user-profile-tab-userfields' ) : '' ) , array( 'id' => $userfield->ufgp_ID ) );
2893          }
2894  
2895          $uf_val = param( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, 'string', NULL );
2896  
2897          $uf_ID = $userfield->uf_ID;
2898          if( $userfield->uf_ID == '0' )
2899          {    // Set uf_ID for new (not saved) fields (recommended & require types)
2900              $userfield->uf_ID = $new_field_name.'['.$userfield->ufdf_ID.'][]';
2901  
2902              $value_num = 'uf_'.$new_field_name.'_'.$userfield->ufdf_ID.'prev_value_num';
2903              global $$value_num;    // Used when user add a many fields with the same type
2904              $$value_num = (int)$$value_num;
2905              if( isset( $uf_new_fields[$userfield->ufdf_ID][$$value_num] ) )
2906              {    // Get a value from submitted form
2907                  $uf_val = $uf_new_fields[$userfield->ufdf_ID][$$value_num];
2908                  $$value_num++;
2909              }
2910          }
2911  
2912          if( is_null( $uf_val ) )
2913          {    // No value submitted yet, get DB val:
2914              $uf_val = $userfield->uf_varchar;
2915          }
2916  
2917          $field_note = '';
2918          $field_size = 40;
2919          if( $action != 'view' )
2920          {
2921              if( in_array( $userfield->ufdf_duplicated, array( 'allowed', 'list' ) ) )
2922              {    // Icon to add a new field for multiple field
2923                  $field_note .= get_icon( 'add', 'imgtag', array( 'rel' => 'add_ufdf_'.$userfield->ufdf_ID, 'style' => 'display:none !important; cursor: pointer; position: relative;' ) );
2924              }
2925          }
2926  
2927          if( $userfield->ufdf_type == 'url' )
2928          { // URL field
2929              $field_size = 80; // use double size
2930              if( ! empty( $uf_val ) )
2931              {
2932                  $url = format_to_output( $uf_val, 'formvalue' );
2933                  if( !preg_match('#://#', $url) )
2934                  {
2935                      $url = 'http://'.$url;
2936                  }
2937                  $field_note .= '<a href="'.$url.'" target="_blank" class="action_icon" style="vertical-align: 0;">'.get_icon( 'play', 'imgtag', array('title'=>T_('Visit the site')) ).'</a>';
2938              }
2939          }
2940  
2941          $field_params = array();
2942          $field_params['rel'] = 'ufdf_'.$userfield->ufdf_ID;
2943          if( $userfield->ufdf_required == 'require' )
2944          {    // Field is required
2945              $field_params['required'] = true;
2946          }
2947          if( $userfield->ufdf_suggest == '1' && $userfield->ufdf_type == 'word' )
2948          {    // Mark field with this tag to suggest a values
2949              $field_params['autocomplete'] = 'on';
2950          }
2951  
2952          $userfield_icon = '';
2953          if( ! empty( $userfield->ufdf_icon_name ) )
2954          { // Field icon
2955              $userfield_icon = '<span class="'.$userfield->ufdf_icon_name.' ufld_'.$userfield->ufdf_code.' ufld__textcolor"></span> ';
2956          }
2957  
2958          if( $action == 'view' )
2959          {    // Only view
2960              $Form->info( $userfield_icon.$userfield->ufdf_name, $uf_val.' '.$field_note );
2961          }
2962          else
2963          {    // Edit mode
2964              switch( $userfield->ufdf_type )
2965              {    // Display existing field:
2966                  case 'text':
2967                      $field_params['cols'] = 38;
2968                      $field_params['note'] = $field_note;
2969                      $Form->textarea_input( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, $uf_val, 5, $userfield_icon.$userfield->ufdf_name, $field_params );
2970                      break;
2971  
2972                  case 'list':
2973                      $uf_options = explode( "\n", str_replace( "\r", '', $userfield->ufdf_options ) );
2974                      if( $userfield->ufdf_required != 'require' || // Not required field
2975                              $uf_ID == '0' || // New reqired field has to have an empty value
2976                              ( $uf_val != '' && ! in_array( $uf_val, $uf_options ) ) ) // Required field has a value that doesn't exist
2977                      {    // Add empty value
2978                          $uf_options = array_merge( array( '---' ), $uf_options );
2979                      }
2980                      $Form->select_input_array( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, $uf_val, $uf_options, $userfield_icon.$userfield->ufdf_name, $field_note, $field_params );
2981                      break;
2982  
2983                  default:
2984                      $field_params['maxlength'] = 255;
2985                      $Form->text_input( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, $uf_val, $field_size, $userfield_icon.$userfield->ufdf_name, $field_note, $field_params );
2986              }
2987          }
2988  
2989          $group_ID = $userfield->ufgp_ID;
2990      }
2991  
2992      if( $group_ID > 0 && $add_group_fieldset )
2993      {    // End gruop fieldset if userfields are exist
2994          $Form->end_fieldset();
2995      }
2996  }

2999  /**
3000   * Prepare some data for Userfield
3001   *
3002   * @param Userfield
3003   */
3004  function userfield_prepare( & $userfield )
3005  {
3006      $userfield->uf_varchar = format_to_output( $userfield->uf_varchar, 'formvalue' );
3007      if( $userfield->ufdf_type == 'url' )
3008      {    // Prepare value for url field
3009          $url = $userfield->uf_varchar;
3010          if( !preg_match('#://#', $url) )
3011          {
3012              $url = 'http://'.$url;
3013          }
3014          $userfield->uf_varchar = '<a href="'.$url.'" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">'.$userfield->uf_varchar.'</a>';
3015      }
3016  }

3019  /**
3020   * Callback to add filters on top of the result set
3021   *
3022   * @param Form
3023   */
3024  function callback_filter_userlist( & $Form )
3025  {
3026      global $Settings, $current_User, $Blog, $edited_Organization;
3027  
3028      $Form->hidden( 'filter', 'new' );
3029  
3030      if( ! is_admin_page() && ! empty( $Blog ) && $Blog->get_setting( 'allow_access' ) == 'members' )
3031      { // Restrict by members only when it is frontoffice and Blog allow access only for members
3032          $Form->checkbox( 'membersonly', get_param( 'membersonly' ), T_('Restrict to members of this blog') );
3033      }
3034  
3035      $Form->text( 'keywords', get_param('keywords'), 20, T_('Name'), '', 50 );
3036  
3037      $Form->checkbox( 'gender_men', get_param('gender_men'), T_('Men') );
3038      $Form->checkbox( 'gender_women', get_param('gender_women'), T_('Women') );
3039  
3040      if( is_admin_page() )
3041      { // show this filters only on admin interface
3042          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
3043          { // Show "Reported users" filter only for users with edit user permission
3044              $Form->checkbox( 'reported', get_param('reported'), T_('Reported users') );
3045              $Form->checkbox( 'custom_sender_email', get_param('custom_sender_email'), T_('Users with custom sender address') );
3046              $Form->checkbox( 'custom_sender_name', get_param('custom_sender_name'), T_('Users with custom sender name') );
3047          }
3048  
3049          $Form->select_input_array( 'account_status', get_param('account_status'), get_user_statuses( T_('All') ), T_('Account status') );
3050  
3051          $GroupCache = new DataObjectCache( 'Group', true, 'T_groups', 'grp_', 'grp_ID', 'grp_name', 'grp_level DESC, grp_name ASC' );
3052          $group_options_array = array(
3053                  '-1' => T_('All (Ungrouped)'),
3054                  '0'  => T_('All (Grouped)'),
3055              ) + $GroupCache->get_option_array();
3056          $Form->select_input_array( 'group', get_param('group'), $group_options_array, T_('User group'), '', array( 'force_keys_as_values' => true ) );
3057      }
3058  
3059      $location_filter_displayed = false;
3060      if( user_country_visible() )
3061      { // Filter by country
3062          load_class( 'regional/model/_country.class.php', 'Country' );
3063          load_funcs( 'regional/model/_regional.funcs.php' );
3064          if( has_cross_country_restriction( 'users', 'list' ) )
3065          { // User cannot browse other users from other country
3066              global $current_User;
3067              $Form->info( T_('Country'), $current_User->get_country_name() );
3068              // Create a hidden country field to correct ajax request to load regions, subregions and cities
3069              $Form->hidden( 'country', $current_User->ctry_ID, array( 'id' => 'country' ) );
3070          }
3071          else
3072          { // User can browse other users from other country
3073              $CountryCache = & get_CountryCache( NT_('All') );
3074              $Form->select_country( 'country', get_param('country'), $CountryCache, T_('Country'), array( 'allow_none' => true ) );
3075              $location_filter_displayed = true;
3076          }
3077      }
3078  
3079      if( user_region_visible() )
3080      {    // Filter by region
3081          $region_filter_disp_style = regions_exist( get_param('country'), true ) ? '' : ' style="display:none"';
3082          echo '<span id="region_filter"'.$region_filter_disp_style.'>';
3083          $Form->select_input_options( 'region', get_regions_option_list( get_param('country'), get_param('region') ), T_('Region') );
3084          echo '</span>';
3085          $location_filter_displayed = $location_filter_displayed || empty( $region_filter_disp_style );
3086      }
3087  
3088      if( user_subregion_visible() )
3089      {    // Filter by subregion
3090          echo '<span id="subregion_filter"'.( !subregions_exist( get_param('region'), true ) ? ' style="display:none"' : '' ).'>';
3091          $Form->select_input_options( 'subregion', get_subregions_option_list( get_param('region'), get_param('subregion') ), T_('Sub-region') );
3092          echo '</span>';
3093      }
3094  
3095      if( user_city_visible() )
3096      {    // Filter by city
3097          echo '<span id="city_filter"'.( !cities_exist( get_param('country'), get_param('region'), get_param('subregion'), true ) ? ' style="display:none"' : '' ).'>';

3099          echo '</span>';
3100      }
3101  
3102      $Form->interval( 'age_min', get_param('age_min'), 'age_max', get_param('age_max'), 3, T_('Age group') );
3103  
3104      $Form->interval( 'level_min', get_param('level_min'), 'level_max', get_param('level_max'), 3, T_('Level') );
3105  
3106      if( empty( $edited_Organization ) )
3107      { // Show organization filter only when organization form is not selected
3108          $OrganizationCache = & get_OrganizationCache( T_('All') );
3109          $OrganizationCache->load_all();
3110          if( count( $OrganizationCache->cache ) > 0 )
3111          {
3112              $Form->select_input_object( 'org', get_param('org'), $OrganizationCache, T_('Organization'), array( 'allow_none' => true ) );

3114      }

3116

3118      $criteria_values = param( 'criteria_value', 'array:string' );
3119

3121      {    // Init one criteria fieldset for first time
3122          $criteria_types[] = '';
3123          $criteria_values[] = '';
3124      }
3125  
3126      foreach( $criteria_types as $c => $type )
3127      {
3128          $value = trim( strip_tags( $criteria_values[$c] ) );
3129          if( $value == '' && count( $criteria_types ) > 1 && $c > 0 )
3130          {    // Don't display empty field again after filter request
3131              continue;
3132          }
3133  
3134          if( $c > 0 )
3135          {    // Separator between criterias
3136              echo '<br />';
3137          }
3138          $Form->output = false;
3139          $criteria_input = $Form->text( 'criteria_value[]', $value, 17, '', '', 50 );
3140          $criteria_input .= get_icon( 'add', 'imgtag', array( 'rel' => 'add_criteria' ) );
3141          $Form->output = true;
3142  
3143          global $user_fields_empty_name;
3144          $user_fields_empty_name = T_('Select...');
3145  
3146          $Form->select( 'criteria_type[]', $type, 'callback_options_user_new_fields', T_('Specific criteria'), $criteria_input );
3147      }
3148  
3149      if( user_region_visible() )
3150      {    // JS functions for AJAX loading of regions, subregions & cities
3151  ?>
3152  <script type="text/javascript">

3154  {

3164              {
3165                  jQuery( '#region_filter' ).show();

3167              else
3168              {
3169                  jQuery( '#region_filter' ).hide();
3170              }
3171              load_subregions( 0 ); // Reset sub-regions
3172          }
3173      } );
3174  } );
3175

3177  {    // Change option list with sub-regions
3178      load_subregions( jQuery( this ).val() );
3179  } );
3180

3251  
3252  /**
3253   * Check if browse users from different countries is restricted for the current User
3254   *
3255   * @param string type of the restrciton to check: 'users', 'contact', 'any'
3256   * @param string Subtype of the restrciton to check: 'users' -> 'list', 'profile'
3257   * @return boolean true if cross country users display is not restricted and countries filter select display is allowed, false otherwise
3258   */
3259  function has_cross_country_restriction( $type = 'users', $subtype = '' )
3260  {
3261      global $current_User, $Settings;
3262  
3263      if( !is_logged_in() )
3264      { // In case of anonymous users we can't check the country, so anonymous users can't have restriction because of this
3265          return false;
3266      }
3267  
3268      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
3269      { // current user has global 'edit users' permission, these users have no restriction
3270          return false;
3271      }
3272  
3273      switch( $type )
3274      {
3275          case 'users': // Check retsriction on users
3276              switch( $subtype )
3277              {
3278                  case 'list':
3279                      if( $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_list' ) )
3280                      { // If anonymous users can browse users list from different countries, then logged in users must be always allowed to browse
3281                          return false;
3282                      }
3283                      break;
3284  
3285                  case 'profile':
3286                      if( $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_profiles' ) )
3287                      { // If anonymous users can browse user profiles from different countries, then logged in users must be always allowed to browse
3288                          return false;
3289                      }
3290                      break;
3291  
3292                  default:
3293                      if( $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_list' ) && $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_profiles' ) )
3294                      { // If anonymous users can browse users list and user profiles from different countries, then logged in users must be always allowed to browse
3295                          return false;
3296                      }
3297                      break;
3298              }
3299              return ! $current_User->check_perm( 'cross_country_allow_profiles' );
3300  
3301          case 'contact': // Check retsriction on contact
3302              return ! $current_User->check_perm( 'cross_country_allow_contact' );
3303  
3304          case 'any': // Check if there is any retsriction
3305          default:
3306              return !( $current_User->check_perm( 'cross_country_allow_profiles' ) && $current_User->check_perm( 'cross_country_allow_contact' ) );
3307      }
3308  }

3496  
3497  /**
3498   * Count reprots by status from the given user
3499   *
3500   * @param integer user ID
3501   * @param boolean set false to get plain result array, or set true to get display format
3502   * @return mixed array if display format is true, string otherwise
3503   */
3504  function count_reports_from( $user_ID, $display_format = true )
3505  {
3506      global $DB, $admin_url;
3507  
3508      $SQL = new SQL();
3509      $SQL->SELECT( 'urep_status as status, COUNT( DISTINCT( urep_reporter_ID ) ) as num_count' );
3510      $SQL->FROM( 'T_users__reports' );
3511      $SQL->WHERE( 'urep_target_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $user_ID ) );
3512      $SQL->GROUP_BY( 'urep_status' );
3513      $reports = $DB->get_assoc( $SQL->get() );
3514  
3515      if( !$display_format )
3516      { // don't display return result
3517          return $reports;
3518      }
3519  
3520      if( empty( $reports ) )
3521      { // there are no reports yet from the given user
3522          return '<span style="color:green">'.T_('No reports yet.').'</span>';
3523      }
3524  
3525      $result = '<span style="color:red">';
3526      foreach( $reports as $status => $num_count )
3527      {
3528          $result .= $status.': '.$num_count.'; ';
3529      }
3530      $result .= '</span>- <a href="'.url_add_param( $admin_url, 'ctrl=user&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID.'&amp;user_tab=activity#reports_result' ).'">'.T_('View').' &raquo;</a>';
3531      return $result;
3532  }

3535  /**
3536   * Report a user
3537   *
3538   * @param integer reported User ID
3539   * @param string reported user status (fake, guidelines, harass, spam, other )
3540   * @param string more info
3541   * @return mixed 1 on success false on error
3542   */
3543  function add_report_from( $user_ID, $status, $info )
3544  {
3545      global $DB, $current_User, $localtimenow;
3546  
3547      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
3548      $reported_User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false );
3549      if( !$reported_User )
3550      { // if user doesn't exists return false
3551          return false;
3552      }
3553  
3554      $result = $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_users__reports( urep_target_user_ID, urep_reporter_ID, urep_status, urep_info, urep_datetime )
3555                          VALUES( '.$DB->quote( $user_ID ).', '.$DB->quote( $current_User->ID ).', '.$DB->quote( $status ).', '.$DB->quote( $info ).', '.$DB->quote( date2mysql( $localtimenow ) ).' )' );
3556      if( $result )
3557      { // if report was successful send user reported notificaitons to admin users
3558          $email_template_params = array(
3559                              'login'          => $reported_User->login,
3560                              'email'          => $reported_User->email,
3561                              'report_status'  => get_report_status_text( $status ),
3562                              'report_info'    => $info,
3563                              'user_ID'        => $user_ID,
3564                              'reported_by'    => $current_User->login,
3565                          );
3566          // send notificaiton ( it will be send to only those users who want to receive this kind of notifications )
3567          send_admin_notification( NT_('User account reported'), 'account_reported', $email_template_params );
3568      }
3569  
3570      return $result;
3571  }

3580  function remove_report_from( $user_ID )

3585                          WHERE urep_target_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $user_ID ).' AND urep_reporter_ID = '.$DB->quote( $current_User->ID ) );
3586  }

3589  /**
3590   * Send an info message to users who reported an account
3591   *
3592   * @param array User IDs who reported for the deleted user
3593   * @param string Login of the user who was reported
3594   * @return boolean TRUE on success
3595   */
3596  function user_send_report_message( $report_user_IDs, $reported_user_login )
3597  {
3598      global $Settings, $UserSettings;
3599  
3600      if( empty( $report_user_IDs ) )
3601      { // No users to recieve PM
3602          return false;
3603      }
3604  
3605      if( ! $Settings->get( 'reportpm_enabled' ) )
3606      { // Sending of report PM is disabled
3607          return false;
3608      }
3609  
3610      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
3611  
3612      // Check sender user login for existing
3613      $from_User = $UserCache->get_by_login( $Settings->get( 'reportpm_from' ) );
3614      if( ! $from_User )
3615      { // Don't send a report email if sender login is incorrect
3616          return false;
3617      }
3618  
3619      foreach( $report_user_IDs as $u => $user_ID )
3620      {
3621          $User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
3622          if( ! $User || ! $User->accepts_pm() || $user_ID == $from_User->ID )
3623          { // User can't read private messages, or doesn't want to receive private messages, or the same user is receiver
3624              unset( $report_user_IDs[ $u ] );
3625          }
3626      }
3627  
3628      if( empty( $report_user_IDs ) )
3629      { // No users to recieve PM
3630          return false;
3631      }
3632  
3633      load_class( 'messaging/model/_thread.class.php', 'Thread' );
3634      load_class( 'messaging/model/_message.class.php', 'Message' );
3635  
3636      $message_title = str_replace( '$reportedlogin$', $reported_user_login, $Settings->get( 'reportpm_title' ) );
3637      $message_text = str_replace( '$reportedlogin$', $reported_user_login, $Settings->get( 'reportpm_message' ) );
3638  
3639      // Insert new thread:
3640      $edited_Thread = new Thread();
3641      $edited_Message = new Message();
3642      $edited_Message->Thread = & $edited_Thread;
3643      $edited_Message->Thread->set( 'title', $message_title );
3644      $edited_Message->Thread->recipients_list = $report_user_IDs;
3645      $edited_Message->set( 'author_user_ID', $from_User->ID );
3646      $edited_Message->creator_user_ID = $from_User->ID;
3647      $edited_Message->set( 'text', $message_text );
3648  
3649      return $edited_Message->dbinsert_individual( $from_User );
3650  }

3653  /**
3654   * Increase spam fighter score for the users who reported the deleted account
3655   *
3656   * @param array User IDs who reported for the deleted user
3657   */
3658  function user_increase_spam_score( $report_user_IDs )
3659  {
3660      global $UserSettings;
3661  
3662      if( empty( $report_user_IDs ) )
3663      { // No users to update spam score
3664          return false;
3665      }
3666  
3667      foreach( $report_user_IDs as $report_user_ID )
3668      {
3669          $score = intval( $UserSettings->get( 'spam_fighter_score', $report_user_ID ) ) + 1;
3670          $UserSettings->set( 'spam_fighter_score', $score, $report_user_ID );
3671      }
3672  
3673      $UserSettings->dbupdate();
3674  }

3719  /**
3720   * Display a voting form
3721   *
3722   * @param array Params
3723   */
3724  function display_voting_form( $params = array() )
3725  {
3726      $params = array_merge( array(
3727              'vote_type'              => 'link',
3728              'vote_ID'                => 0,
3729              'display_like'           => true,
3730              'display_noopinion'      => true,
3731              'display_dontlike'       => true,
3732              'display_inappropriate'  => true,
3733              'display_spam'           => true,
3734              'title_text'             => T_('My vote:'),
3735              'title_like'             => T_('I like this picture'),
3736              'title_like_voted'       => T_('You like this!'),
3737              'title_noopinion'        => T_('I have no opinion'),
3738              'title_noopinion_voted'  => T_('You have no opinion on this.'),
3739              'title_dontlike'         => T_('I don\'t like this picture'),
3740              'title_dontlike_voted'   => T_('You don\'t like this.'),
3741              'title_inappropriate'    => T_('I think the content of this picture is inappropriate'),
3742              'title_spam'             => T_('I think this picture was posted by a spammer'),
3743              // Number of votes
3744              'display_numbers'        => false,
3745              'msg_no_votes'           => T_('No likes yet'),
3746              'msg_1_like'             => T_('1 person likes this'),
3747              'msg_x_likes'            => T_('%d people like this'),
3748              'msg_1_dislike'          => T_('1 person dislikes this'),
3749              'msg_x_dislikes'         => T_('%d people dislike this'),
3750              'msg_1_like_1_dislike'   => T_('1 like - 1 dislike'),
3751              'msg_x_likes_1_dislike'  => T_('%d likes - 1 dislike'),
3752              'msg_1_like_x_dislikes'  => T_('1 like - %d dislikes'),
3753              'msg_x_likes_x_dislikes' => T_('%d likes - %d dislikes'),
3754          ), $params );
3755  
3756      if( !is_logged_in() || empty( $params['vote_ID'] ) )
3757      {
3758          return;
3759      }
3760  
3761      global $current_User, $DB, $b2evo_icons_type, $blog;
3762  
3763      $params_like = array(
3764              'id' => 'votingLike',
3765              'title' => $params['title_like']
3766          );
3767      $params_noopinion = array(
3768              'id' => 'votingNoopinion',
3769              'title' => $params['title_noopinion']
3770          );
3771      $params_dontlike = array(
3772              'id' => 'votingDontlike',
3773              'title' => $params['title_dontlike']
3774          );
3775      $params_inappropriate = array(
3776              'id' => 'votingInappropriate',
3777              'title' => $params['title_inappropriate']
3778          );
3779      $params_spam = array(
3780              'id' => 'votingSpam',
3781              'title' => $params['title_spam']
3782          );
3783  
3784      $vote_numbers = '';
3785  
3786      switch( $params['vote_type'] )
3787      { // Get a voting results for current user
3788          case 'link':
3789              // Picture
3790              $SQL = new SQL( 'Get file voting for current user' );
3791              $SQL->SELECT( 'lvot_like AS result, lvot_inappropriate AS inappropriate, lvot_spam AS spam' );
3792              $SQL->FROM( 'T_links__vote' );
3793              $SQL->WHERE( 'lvot_link_ID = '.$DB->quote( $params['vote_ID'] ) );
3794              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'lvot_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $current_User->ID ) );
3795              $vote = $DB->get_row( $SQL->get() );
3796  
3797              $params_spam['class'] = 'cboxCheckbox';
3798  
3799              // Number of votes
3800              if( $params['display_numbers'] )
3801              { // Calculate the numbers of votes for current link
3802                  $SQL = new SQL( 'Get number of votes for the link #'.$params['vote_ID'] );
3803                  $SQL->SELECT( 'SUM( IF( lvot_like = 1, 1, 0 ) ) AS num_likes, SUM( IF( lvot_like = -1, 1, 0 ) ) AS num_dislikes' );
3804                  $SQL->FROM( 'T_links__vote' );
3805                  $SQL->WHERE( 'lvot_link_ID = '.$DB->quote( $params['vote_ID'] ) );
3806                  $SQL->WHERE_and( 'lvot_like = "1" OR lvot_like = "-1"' );
3807                  $number_votes = $DB->get_row( $SQL->get() );
3808  
3809                  $num_likes = intval( $number_votes->num_likes );
3810                  $num_dislikes = intval( $number_votes->num_dislikes );
3811  
3812                  if( $num_likes == 0 && $num_dislikes == 0 )
3813                  { // No votes
3814                      $vote_numbers = $params['msg_no_votes'];
3815                  }
3816                  elseif( $num_likes == 1 && $num_dislikes == 0 )
3817                  { // Only 1 like
3818                      $vote_numbers = $params['msg_1_like'];
3819                  }
3820                  elseif( $num_likes > 1 && $num_dislikes == 0 )
3821                  { // Only X likes
3822                      $vote_numbers = sprintf( $params['msg_x_likes'], $num_likes );
3823                  }
3824                  elseif( $num_likes == 0 && $num_dislikes == 1 )
3825                  { // Only 1 dislike
3826                      $vote_numbers = $params['msg_1_dislike'];
3827                  }
3828                  elseif( $num_likes == 0 && $num_dislikes > 1 )
3829                  { // Only X dislikes
3830                      $vote_numbers = sprintf( $params['msg_x_dislikes'], $num_dislikes );
3831                  }
3832                  elseif( $num_likes == 1 && $num_dislikes == 1 )
3833                  { // 1 like and 1 dislike
3834                      $vote_numbers = $params['msg_1_like_1_dislike'];
3835                  }
3836                  elseif( $num_likes > 1 && $num_dislikes == 1 )
3837                  { // X likes and 1 dislike
3838                      $vote_numbers = sprintf( $params['msg_x_likes_1_dislike'], $num_likes );
3839                  }
3840                  elseif( $num_likes == 1 && $num_dislikes > 1 )
3841                  { // 1 like and X dislikes
3842                      $vote_numbers = sprintf( $params['msg_1_like_x_dislikes'], $num_dislikes );
3843                  }
3844                  elseif( $num_likes > 1 && $num_dislikes > 1 )
3845                  { // X likes and X dislike
3846                      $vote_numbers = sprintf( $params['msg_x_likes_x_dislikes'], $num_likes, $num_dislikes );
3847                  }
3848  
3849                  $vote_numbers .= empty( $vote_numbers ) ? '' : ' - ';
3850              }
3851  
3852              break;
3853  
3854          case 'comment':
3855              // Comment
3856              $SQL = new SQL();
3857              $SQL->SELECT( 'cmvt_helpful AS result' );
3858              $SQL->FROM( 'T_comments__votes' );
3859              $SQL->WHERE( 'cmvt_cmt_ID = '.$DB->quote( $params['vote_ID'] ) );
3860              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'cmvt_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $current_User->ID ) );
3861              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'cmvt_helpful IS NOT NULL' );
3862              $vote = $DB->get_row( $SQL->get() );
3863  
3864              break;
3865      }
3866  
3867      if( empty( $vote ) || is_null( $vote->result ) )
3868      {    // Current user didn't vote for this file yet
3869          $icon_like = 'thumb_up';
3870          $icon_noopinion = 'ban';
3871          $icon_dontlike = 'thumb_down';
3872          $type_voted = '';
3873      }
3874      else
3875      {    // Current user already voted for this file, We should set a disabled icons correctly
3876          switch( $vote->result )
3877          {
3878              case '-1':
3879                  // Don't like
3880                  $type_voted = 'dontlike';
3881                  $icon_like = 'thumb_up_disabled';
3882                  $icon_noopinion = 'ban_disabled';
3883                  $icon_dontlike = 'thumb_down';
3884                  $params_dontlike['class'] = 'voted';
3885                  $params_dontlike['title'] = $params['title_dontlike_voted'];
3886                  unset( $params_dontlike['id'] );
3887                  break;
3888  
3889              case '0':
3890                  // No opinion
3891                  $type_voted = 'noopinion';
3892                  $icon_like = 'thumb_up_disabled';
3893                  $icon_noopinion = 'ban';
3894                  $icon_dontlike = 'thumb_down_disabled';
3895                  $params_noopinion['class'] = 'voted';
3896                  $params_noopinion['title'] = $params['title_noopinion_voted'];
3897                  unset( $params_noopinion['id'] );
3898                  break;
3899  
3900              case '1':
3901                  // Like
3902                  $type_voted = 'like';
3903                  $icon_like = 'thumb_up';
3904                  $icon_noopinion = 'ban_disabled';
3905                  $icon_dontlike = 'thumb_down_disabled';
3906                  $params_like['class'] = 'voted';
3907                  $params_like['title'] = $params['title_like_voted'];
3908                  unset( $params_like['id'] );
3909                  break;
3910          }
3911      }
3912  
3913      $checked_inappropriate = '';
3914      $checked_spam = '';
3915      if( !empty( $vote ) )
3916      {    // Current user already marked this file
3917          if( !empty( $vote->inappropriate ) )
3918          {    // File is marked as 'Inappropriate'
3919              $checked_inappropriate = ' checked="checked"';
3920          }
3921          if( !empty( $vote->spam ) )
3922          {    // File is marked as 'Spam'
3923              $checked_spam = ' checked="checked"';
3924          }
3925      }
3926  
3927      echo '<span class="vote_title">'.$vote_numbers.'<span class="vote_title_text">'.$params['title_text'].'</span></span>';
3928  
3929      $blog_param = empty( $blog ) ? '' : '&blog='.$blog;
3930      // Set this url for case when JavaScript is not enabled
3931      $url = get_secure_htsrv_url().'anon_async.php?action=voting&vote_type='.$params['vote_type'].'&vote_ID='.$params['vote_ID'].$blog_param.'&'.url_crumb( 'voting' );
3932      // Save action url here in order to have new crumb on every voting form loading
3933      echo '<input type="hidden" id="voting_action" value="'.$url.'&b2evo_icons_type='.$b2evo_icons_type.'" />';
3934      $redirect_to = regenerate_url();
3935      if( strpos( $redirect_to, 'async.php' ) === false )
3936      {    // Append a redirect param
3937          $url .= '&redirect_to='.$redirect_to;
3938      }
3939  
3940      if( $params['display_like'] )
3941      {    // Display 'Like' icon
3942          $tag_icon = get_icon( $icon_like, 'imgtag', $params_like );
3943          if( $type_voted == 'like' )
3944          {
3945              echo $tag_icon;
3946          }
3947          else
3948          {
3949              $url_like = $url.'&vote_action=like';
3950              $class = ( strpos( $icon_like, 'disabled' ) !== false ) ? ' rollover_sprite' : '';
3951              echo '<a href="'.$url_like.'" class="action_icon'.$class.'">'.$tag_icon.'</a>';
3952          }
3953      }
3954  
3955      if( $params['display_noopinion'] )
3956      {    // Display 'No opinion' icon
3957          $tag_icon = get_icon( $icon_noopinion, 'imgtag', $params_noopinion );
3958          if( $type_voted == 'noopinion' )
3959          {
3960              echo $tag_icon;
3961          }
3962          else
3963          {
3964              $url_noopinion = $url.'&vote_action=noopinion';
3965              $class = ( strpos( $icon_noopinion, 'disabled' ) !== false ) ? ' rollover_sprite' : '';
3966              echo '<a href="'.$url_noopinion.'" class="action_icon'.$class.'">'.$tag_icon.'</a>';
3967          }
3968      }
3969  
3970      if( $params['display_dontlike'] )
3971      {    // Display 'Dont like' icon
3972          $tag_icon = get_icon( $icon_dontlike, 'imgtag', $params_dontlike );
3973          if( $type_voted == 'dontlike' )
3974          {
3975              echo $tag_icon;
3976          }
3977          else
3978          {
3979              $url_dontlike = $url.'&vote_action=dontlike';
3980              $class = ( strpos( $icon_dontlike, 'disabled' ) !== false ) ? ' rollover_sprite' : '';
3981              echo '<a href="'.$url_dontlike.'" class="action_icon'.$class.'">'.$tag_icon.'</a>';
3982          }
3983      }
3984  
3985      if( $params['display_inappropriate'] || $params['display_spam'] )
3986      {    // Display separator between icons and checkboxes
3987          echo '<span class="separator">&nbsp;</span>';
3988      }
3989  
3990      if( $params['display_inappropriate'] )
3991      {    // Display 'Inappropriate' checkbox
3992          echo '<label for="'.$params_inappropriate['id'].'" title="'.$params_inappropriate['title'].'">'.
3993                  '<input type="checkbox" id="'.$params_inappropriate['id'].'" name="'.$params_inappropriate['id'].'"'.$checked_inappropriate.' />'.
3994                  '<span>'.T_('Inappropriate').'</span>'.
3995              '</label>';
3996      }
3997  
3998      if( $params['display_spam'] )
3999      {    // Display 'Spam' checkbox
4000          echo '<label for="'.$params_spam['id'].'" class="'.$params_spam['class'].'" title="'.$params_spam['title'].'">'.
4001                  '<input type="checkbox" id="'.$params_spam['id'].'" name="'.$params_spam['id'].'"'.$checked_spam.' />'.
4002                  '<span>'.T_('Spam').'</span>'.
4003              '</label>';
4004      }
4005  
4006      // Create a hidden input with current ID

4008  }

4011  /**
4012   * Find other users with the same email address
4013   *
4014   * @param integer User ID to exclude current edited user from list
4015   * @param string User email
4016   * @param string Message for note about users with the same email
4017   * @return boolean|string FALSE if no users with the same email | Message about other users also have the same email
4018   */
4019  function find_users_with_same_email( $user_ID, $user_email, $message )
4020  {
4021      global $DB;
4022  
4023      $email_users_SQL = new SQL();
4024      $email_users_SQL->SELECT( 'user_ID, user_login' );
4025      $email_users_SQL->FROM( 'T_users' );
4026      $email_users_SQL->WHERE( 'user_email = '.$DB->quote( utf8_strtolower( $user_email ) ) );
4027      $email_users_SQL->WHERE_and( 'user_ID != '.$DB->quote( $user_ID ) );
4028      $email_users = $DB->get_assoc( $email_users_SQL->get() );
4029      if( empty( $email_users ) )
4030      { // No users found with email
4031          return false;
4032      }
4033  
4034      $users_links = array();
4035      foreach( $email_users as $email_user_ID => $email_user_login )
4036      {
4037          global $admin_url;
4038          $users_links[] = '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;user_ID='.$email_user_ID.'">'.$email_user_login.'</a>';
4039      }
4040  
4041      return sprintf( $message, $user_email, implode( ', ', $users_links ) );
4042  }

4044  
4045  /**
4046   * Display message depending on user email status
4047   *
4048   * @param integer User ID
4049   */
4050  function display_user_email_status_message( $user_ID = 0 )
4051  {
4052      global $Messages, $current_User, $Blog, $disp;
4053  
4054      if( ! is_logged_in() || ( $user_ID != 0 && $user_ID != $current_User->ID ) )
4055      { // User must be logged in AND only for current User
4056          return;
4057      }
4058  
4059      $email_status = $current_User->get_email_status();
4060  
4061      if( empty( $email_status ) || ! in_array( $email_status, array( 'redemption', 'warning', 'suspicious1', 'suspicious2', 'suspicious3', 'prmerror' ) ) )
4062      { // No message for current email status
4063          return;
4064      }
4065  
4066      $EmailAddressCache = & get_EmailAddressCache();
4067      $EmailAddress = & $EmailAddressCache->get_by_name( $current_User->get( 'email' ), false, false );
4068  
4069      $is_admin_page = is_admin_page() || empty( $Blog );
4070      if( check_user_status( 'is_validated' ) )
4071      { // Url to user profile page
4072          $url_change_email = get_user_settings_url( 'subs' );
4073      }
4074      else
4075      { // Url to activate email address
4076          $url_change_email = get_activate_info_url( NULL, '&amp;' );
4077      }
4078  
4079      // Url to change status
4080      if( $is_admin_page )
4081      {
4082          global $admin_url;
4083          $user_tab_param = get_param( 'user_tab' ) != '' ? '&amp;user_tab='.get_param( 'user_tab' ) : '';
4084          $url_change_status = $admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;action=redemption&amp;user_ID='.$current_User->ID.$user_tab_param.'&amp;'.url_crumb( 'user' );
4085      }
4086      else
4087      {
4088          $user_tab_param = empty( $disp ) ? 'profile' : $disp;
4089          $url_change_status = get_secure_htsrv_url().'profile_update.php?action=redemption&amp;user_tab='.$user_tab_param.'&amp;blog='.$Blog->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb( 'user' );
4090      }
4091  
4092      // Display info about last error only when such data exists
4093      $email_last_sent_ts = ( empty( $EmailAddress ) ? '' : $EmailAddress->get( 'last_sent_ts' ) );
4094      $last_error_info = empty( $email_last_sent_ts ) ? '' :
4095          ' '.sprintf( /* TRANS: date of last error */ T_( '(last error was detected on %s)' ), mysql2localedatetime_spans( $email_last_sent_ts, 'M-d' ) );
4096  
4097      switch( $email_status )
4098      {
4099          case 'warning':
4100          case 'suspicious1':
4101          case 'suspicious2':
4102          case 'suspicious3':
4103              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_( 'We have detected some delivery problems to your email account %s%s. Please add our email: %s to your address book. If you still don\'t receive our emails, try using a different email address instead of %s for your account.<br /><a %s>Click here to use a different email address</a>.<br /><a %s>Click here to discard this message once you receive our emails again</a>.' ),
4104                      '<b>'.$current_User->get( 'email' ).'</b>',
4105                      $last_error_info,
4106                      '<b>'.user_get_notification_sender( $current_User->ID, 'email' ).'</b>',
4107                      '<b>'.$current_User->get( 'email' ).'</b>',
4108                      'href="'.$url_change_email.'"',
4109                      'href="'.$url_change_status.'"'
4110                  ), 'error' );
4111              break;
4112  
4113          case 'prmerror':
4114              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_( 'Your email address: %s does not seem to work or is refusing our emails%s. Please check your email address carefully. If it\'s incorrect, <a %s>change your email address</a>. If it\'s correct, please add our email: %s to your address book, then <a %s>click here to try again</a>!' ),
4115                      '<b>'.$current_User->get( 'email' ).'</b>',
4116                      $last_error_info,
4117                      'href="'.$url_change_email.'"',
4118                      '<b>'.user_get_notification_sender( $current_User->ID, 'email' ).'</b>',
4119                      'href="'.$url_change_status.'"'
4120                  ), 'error' );
4121              break;
4122  
4123          case 'redemption':
4124              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_( 'We are currently trying to send email to your address: %s again.' ),
4125                      '<b>'.$current_User->get( 'email' ).'</b>'
4126                  ), 'note' );
4127              break;
4128      }
4129  }

4234  function echo_user_crop_avatar_window()

4239      { // Ajax params for backoffice
4240          $ajax_url = $admin_url;
4241          $ajax_params = "'ctrl': 'user',
4242                  'user_tab': 'crop',
4243                  'user_tab_from': user_tab_from,\r\n";
4244      }
4245      else
4246      { // Ajax params for frontoffice
4247          global $blog;
4248          $ajax_url = get_secure_htsrv_url().'anon_async.php';
4249          $ajax_params = "'blog': '{$blog}',
4250                  'disp': 'avatar',
4251                  'action': 'crop',\r\n";
4252      }
4253  ?>
4254  <script type="text/javascript">
4255  <?php
4256  // Initialize JavaScript to build and open window
4257  echo_modalwindow_js();
4258  ?>
4259  	function user_crop_avatar( user_ID, file_ID, user_tab_from )
4260      {
4261          if( typeof( user_tab_from ) == 'undefined' )
4262          {
4263              user_tab_from = 'avatar';
4264          }
4265  
4266          var max_size = 750;
4267          var min_size = 320;
4268  
4269          var viewport_width = jQuery( window ).width();
4270          var viewport_height = jQuery( window ).height();
4271          //console.log( 'viewport', viewport_width, viewport_height );

4275          var window_height = viewport_height;
4276          // Limit window with max & min sizes:
4277          window_height = ( window_height > max_size ) ? max_size : ( ( window_height < min_size ) ? min_size : window_height );
4278          window_width = ( window_width > max_size ) ? max_size : ( ( window_width < min_size ) ? min_size : window_width );
4279          //console.log( 'window', window_width, window_height );
4280

4293          var image_height = window_height - margin_size_height;

4383  /**
4384   * Display user report form
4385   *
4386   * @param array Params
4387   */
4388  function user_report_form( $params = array() )
4389  {
4390      global $current_User, $display_mode;
4391  
4392      $params = array_merge( array(
4393              'Form'       => NULL,
4394              'user_ID'    => 0,
4395              'crumb_name' => '',
4396              'cancel_url' => '',
4397          ), $params );
4398  
4399      if( ! is_logged_in() || $current_User->ID == $params['user_ID'] || ! $current_User->check_status( 'can_report_user' ) )
4400      { // Current user must be logged in, cannot report own account, and must has a permission to report
4401          return;
4402      }
4403  
4404      $Form = & $params['Form'];
4405  
4406      $Form->add_crumb( $params['crumb_name'] );
4407      $Form->hidden( 'user_ID', $params['user_ID'] );
4408  
4409      $report_options = array_merge( array( 'none' => '' ), get_report_statuses() );
4410  
4411      // Use JS to show/hide textarea only for normal view
4412      $use_js = ! ( isset( $display_mode ) && $display_mode == 'js' );
4413  
4414      // get current User report from edited User
4415      $current_report = get_report_from( $params['user_ID'] );
4416  
4417      if( $current_report == NULL )
4418      { // currentUser didn't add any report from this user yet
4419          $Form->custom_content( '<p class="alert alert-warning"><strong>'.get_icon('warning_yellow').' '.T_( 'If you have an issue with this user, you can report it here:' ).'</strong></p>' );
4420  
4421          $report_content = '<select id="report_user_status" name="report_user_status" class="form-control" style="width:auto">';
4422          foreach( $report_options as $option => $option_label )
4423          { // add select option, none must be selected
4424              $report_content .= '<option '.( ( $option == 'none' ) ? 'selected="selected" ' : '' ).'value="'.$option.'">'.$option_label.'</option>';
4425          }
4426          $report_content .= '</select><div id="report_info" style="width:100%;">$report_info_content$</div>';
4427  
4428          $info_content = '<br />'.T_('You can provide additional information below').':';
4429          $info_content .= '<textarea id="report_info_content" name="report_info_content" class="form_textarea_input form-control" rows="2" maxlength="240"></textarea>';
4430          $info_content .= '<br /><input type="submit" class="SaveButton btn btn-danger" value="'.T_('Report this user now!').'" name="actionArray[report_user]" />';
4431          if( $use_js )
4432          {
4433              $report_content = str_replace( '$report_info_content$', '', $report_content );
4434              $report_content .= '<script type="text/javascript">
4435                  var info_content = \''.$info_content.'\';
4436                  jQuery("#report_user_status").change( function() {
4437                      var report_info = jQuery("#report_info");
4438                      var value = jQuery(this).val();
4439                      if( value == "none" )
4440                      {
4441                          report_info.html("");
4442                      }
4443                      else if( report_info.is(":empty") )
4444                      {
4445                          report_info.html( info_content );
4446                      }
4447                  });
4448                  </script>';
4449              $report_content .= '<noscript>'.$info_content.'</noscript>';
4450          }
4451          else
4452          {
4453              $report_content = str_replace( '$report_info_content$', $info_content, $report_content );
4454          }
4455          $Form->info( T_('Reason'), $report_content );
4456      }
4457      else
4458      {
4459          echo '<div id="current_modal_title" style="display:none">'.T_('Already Reported User').'</div>';
4460          printf( T_('You have reported this user on %s<br />as "%s"<br />with the additional info "%s"'),
4461                  mysql2localedatetime( $current_report['date'] ),
4462                  $report_options[ $current_report['status'] ],
4463                  nl2br( $current_report['info'] ) );
4464          echo '<p><a href="'.$params['cancel_url'].'" class="btn btn-warning">'.T_('Cancel Report').'</a></p>';
4465      }
4466  }

4507  /**
4508   * Check invitation code and display error on incorrect code
4509   * This function is used on registration form
4510   *
4511   * @param string Name of invitation field
4512   * @return string What field to display on registration form for invitation code:
4513   *        ''      - Don't display a field of invitation code
4514   *        'info'  - Display an info field with invitation code
4515   *        'input' - Display an input field to change invitation code
4516   *        'deny'  - Don't display a registration form at all
4517   */
4518  function check_invitation_code( $invitation_name = 'invitation' )
4519  {
4520      global $Settings;
4521  
4522      if( $Settings->get( 'newusers_canregister' ) == 'no' )
4523      { // Don't display a registration form when it is disabled for all
4524          return 'deny';
4525      }
4526  
4527      $invitation = param( $invitation_name, 'string' );
4528  
4529      if( $invitation == 'y' )
4530      { // It is used to enter an invatation code manually
4531          set_param( $invitation_name, '' );
4532          return 'input';
4533      }
4534      elseif( ! empty( $invitation ) )
4535      { // Check invitation code if it is entered
4536          if( ! preg_match( '#^[A-Za-z0-9\-_]{3,32}$#', $invitation ) )
4537          { // Invitation code has incorrect format
4538              param_error( $invitation_name, T_('Invitation code is incorrect!') );
4539              return 'input';
4540          }
4541          else
4542          { // Check invitation code in DB
4543              global $DB, $localtimenow;
4544  
4545              $SQL = new SQL();
4546              $SQL->SELECT( 'ivc_ID' );
4547              $SQL->FROM( 'T_users__invitation_code' );
4548              $SQL->WHERE( 'ivc_code = '.$DB->quote( $invitation ) );
4549              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'ivc_expire_ts > '.$DB->quote( date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s', $localtimenow ) ) );
4550              $invitation_ID = $DB->get_var( $SQL->get() );
4551              if( is_null( $invitation_ID ) )
4552              { // Invitation code doesn't exist in DB or it is expired
4553                  param_error( $invitation_name, T_('Invitation code is incorrect!') );
4554                  return 'input';
4555              }
4556              else
4557              { // Invitation code is correct, Display it as info field on the registration form
4558                  return 'info';
4559              }
4560          }
4561      }
4562  
4563      if( empty( $invitation ) && $Settings->get( 'newusers_canregister' ) == 'invite' )
4564      { // Users can register only with invitation code
4565          if( $Settings->get( 'registration_is_public' ) )
4566          { // Display registration form even when invitation code is empty but setting "Registration links" is enabled
4567              // The invitation field should be visible for this case
4568              return 'input';
4569          }
4570          else
4571          { // Don't display a registration form
4572              return 'deny';
4573          }
4574      }
4575  
4576      if( $Settings->get( 'newusers_canregister' ) == 'invite' )
4577      { // Always display the invitation field when users can register ONLY with invitation code
4578          return 'input';
4579      }
4580      else
4581      { // Don't display a field for invitation code, when this setting == 'yes'(Users can register themselves freely)
4582          return '';
4583      }
4584  }
4585  
4586  
4587  /**
4588   * Get IDs of users by logins separated by comma
4589   * Used to filter the posts by authors and assigned users
4590   *
4591   * @param string Logins (e.g. 'admin,ablogger,auser')
4592   * @return string Users IDs (e.g. '1,3,5')
4593   */
4594  function get_users_IDs_by_logins( $logins )
4595  {
4596      if( empty( $logins ) )
4597      {
4598          return '';
4599      }
4600  
4601      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
4602  
4603      $logins = explode( ',', $logins );
4604      $ids = array();
4605      foreach( $logins as $login )
4606      {
4607          if( $User = $UserCache->get_by_login( $login, true ) )
4608          { // User exists with this login
4609              $ids[] = $User->ID;
4610          }
4611      }
4612  
4613      return implode( ',', $ids );
4614  }
