4617  /**
4618   * Display user's reposts results table
4619   *
4620   * @param array Params
4621   */
4622  function user_reports_results_block( $params = array() )
4623  {
4624      // Make sure we are not missing any param:
4625      $params = array_merge( array(
4626              'edited_User'          => NULL,
4627              'results_param_prefix' => 'actv_reports_',
4628              'results_title'        => T_('This user profile has been reported by other users!'),
4629              'results_no_text'      => T_('User was not reported yet.'),
4630          ), $params );
4631  
4632      if( !is_logged_in() )
4633      {    // Only logged in users can access to this function
4634          return;
4635      }
4636  
4637      global $current_User;
4638      if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'moderate' ) )
4639      {    // Check minimum permission:
4640          return;
4641      }
4642  
4643      $edited_User = $params['edited_User'];
4644      if( !$edited_User )
4645      {    // No defined User, probably the function is calling from AJAX request
4646          $user_ID = param( 'user_ID', 'integer', 0 );
4647          if( empty( $user_ID ) )
4648          {    // Bad request, Exit here
4649              return;
4650          }
4651          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
4652          if( ( $edited_User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false ) ) === false )
4653          {    // Bad request, Exit here
4654              return;
4655          }
4656      }
4657  
4658      global $DB, $AdminUI;
4659  
4660      param( 'user_tab', 'string', '', true );
4661      param( 'user_ID', 'integer', 0, true );
4662  
4663  
4664      $SQL = new SQL();
4665      $SQL->SELECT( 'user_login, urep_datetime, urep_status, urep_info, urep_reporter_ID, urep_target_user_ID' );
4666      $SQL->FROM( 'T_users__reports' );
4667      $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_users ON user_ID = urep_reporter_ID' );
4668      $SQL->WHERE( 'urep_target_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $edited_User->ID ) );
4669  
4670      // Create result set:
4671      $reports_Results = new Results( $SQL->get(), $params['results_param_prefix'], 'D' );
4672      $reports_Results->title = $params['results_title'];
4673      $reports_Results->no_results_text = $params['results_no_text'];
4674  
4675      // Initialize Results object
4676      user_reports_results( $reports_Results );
4677  
4678      if( is_ajax_content() )
4679      {    // init results param by template name
4680          if( !isset( $params[ 'skin_type' ] ) || ! isset( $params[ 'skin_name' ] ) )
4681          {
4682              debug_die( 'Invalid ajax results request!' );
4683          }
4684          $reports_Results->init_params_by_skin( $params[ 'skin_type' ], $params[ 'skin_name' ] );
4685      }
4686  
4687      $results_params = $AdminUI->get_template( 'Results' );
4688      $display_params = array(
4689          'before' => str_replace( '>', ' style="margin-top:25px" id="reports_result">', $results_params['before'] ),
4690      );
4691      $reports_Results->display( $display_params );
4692  
4693      if( !is_ajax_content() )
4694      {    // Create this hidden div to get a function name for AJAX request
4695          echo '<div id="'.$params['results_param_prefix'].'ajax_callback" style="display:none">'.__FUNCTION__.'</div>';
4696      }
4697  
4698      // Who should be able to delete other users reports???
4699      /*if( $reports_Results->get_total_rows() > 0 )
4700      {    // Display button to delete all records if at least one record exists & current user can delete at least one item created by user
4701          echo action_icon( sprintf( T_('Delete all reports from %s'), $edited_User->login ), 'delete', '?ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=activity&amp;action=delete_all_reports_from&amp;user_ID='.$edited_User->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user'), ' '.T_('Delete all'), 3, 4 );
4702      }*/
4703  }

4764  {
4765      // Make sure we are not missing any param:

4777              'keywords_fields'      => NULL,
4778              'where_status_closed'  => NULL,

4780              'display_orgstatus'    => false,

4783              'display_btn_adduser'  => true,
4784              'display_btn_addgroup' => true,

4786              'display_avatar'       => true,
4787              'display_login'        => true,
4788              'display_nickname'     => true,
4789              'display_name'         => true,
4790              'display_gender'       => true,
4791              'display_country'      => true,
4792              'display_city'         => false,
4793              'display_blogs'        => true,
4794              'display_source'       => true,
4795              'display_regdate'      => true,
4796              'display_regcountry'   => true,
4797              'display_update'       => true,
4798              'display_lastvisit'    => true,
4799              'display_contact'      => true,
4800              'display_reported'     => true,
4801              'display_group'        => true,
4802              'display_level'        => true,
4803              'display_status'       => true,
4804              'display_actions'      => true,
4805              'display_newsletter'   => true,
4806              'force_check_user'     => false,
4807          ), $params );
4808  
4809      global $current_User;
4810      if( ! $params['force_check_user'] )
4811      {
4812          if( ! is_logged_in() )
4813          { // Only logged in users can access to this function
4814              return;
4815          }
4816          if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'view' ) )
4817          { // Check minimum permission:
4818              return;
4819          }
4820      }
4821  
4822      global $DB, $UserSettings, $Settings, $action, $admin_url;
4823  
4824      // query which groups have users (in order to prevent deletion of groups which have users)
4825      global $usedgroups; // We need this in a callback below
4826      $usedgroups = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT grp_ID
4827          FROM T_groups INNER JOIN T_users ON user_grp_ID = grp_ID
4828          GROUP BY grp_ID' );
4829  
4830      // Create result set:
4831      load_class( 'users/model/_userlist.class.php', 'UserList' );
4832      $UserList = new UserList( $params['filterset_name'], $UserSettings->get('results_per_page'), $params['results_param_prefix'], array(
4833              'join_group'          => $params['join_group'],

4835              'join_country'        => $params['join_country'],
4836              'keywords_fields'     => $params['keywords_fields'],

4838              'where_org_ID'        => $params['org_ID'],

4840      $default_filters = array( 'order' => $params['results_order'], 'org' => $params['org_ID'] );
4841      $UserList->title = $params['results_title'];
4842      $UserList->no_results_text = $params['results_no_text'];
4843  
4844      $UserList->set_default_filters( $default_filters );
4845      $UserList->load_from_Request();
4846  
4847      // Initialize Results object
4848      users_results( $UserList, $params );
4849  
4850      if( $action == 'show_recent' )
4851      { // Sort an users list by "Registered" field
4852          $UserList->set_order( 'user_created_datetime' );
4853      }
4854  
4855      // Execute query
4856      $UserList->query();
4857  
4858  
4859      if( $params['display_filters'] )
4860      { // Display the filters
4861          $filter_presets = array(
4862                  'all' => array( T_('All users'), url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'filter=new' ) ),
4863                  'men' => array( T_('Men'), url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'gender_men=1&amp;filter=new' ) ),
4864                  'women' => array( T_('Women'), url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'gender_women=1&amp;filter=new' ) ),
4865              );
4866  
4867          if( is_admin_page() )
4868          { // Add show only activated users filter only on admin interface
4869              $filter_presets['activated'] = array( T_('Activated users'), url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'status_activated=1&amp;filter=new' ) );
4870              if( is_logged_in() && $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
4871              { // Show "Reported Users" filter only for users with edit user permission
4872                  $filter_presets['reported'] = array( T_('Reported users'), url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'reported=1&amp;filter=new' ) );
4873              }
4874          }
4875

4879          }
4880  
4881          $UserList->filter_area = array(
4882              'callback' => 'callback_filter_userlist',
4883              'url_ignore' => 'users_paged,u_paged,keywords',
4884              'presets' => $filter_presets,
4885              );
4886      }
4887  
4888      /*
4889       * Table icons:
4890       */
4891      if( $params['display_btn_refresh'] )
4892      { // Display a button to refresh the users list
4893          $UserList->global_icon( T_('Refresh users list...'), 'refresh', url_add_param( $params['page_url'], 'filter=refresh' ), T_('Refresh'), 3, 4, array( 'class' => 'action_icon btn-warning' ) );
4894      }
4895      if( is_logged_in() && $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit', false ) )
4896      {
4897          if( $params['display_btn_adduser'] )
4898          { // Display a button to add user
4899              $UserList->global_icon( T_('Create a new user...'), 'new', $admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;action=new&amp;user_tab=profile', T_('Add user').' &raquo;', 3, 4, array( 'class' => 'action_icon btn-primary' ) );
4900          }
4901          if( $params['display_btn_adduser'] )
4902          { // Display a button to add group
4903              $UserList->global_icon( T_('Create a new group...'), 'new', $admin_url.'?ctrl=groups&amp;action=new', T_('Add group').' &raquo;', 3, 4 );
4904          }
4905      }
4906  
4907      // Display result :
4908      $UserList->display( $params['display_params'] );
4909  
4910      if( $params['display_newsletter'] && is_logged_in() && $current_User->check_perm( 'emails', 'edit' ) && $UserList->result_num_rows > 0 )
4911      { // Newsletter button
4912          global $admin_url;

4915          echo '</p>';

5172                          .get_icon( 'www', 'imgtag', array( 'class' => 'middle', 'title' => format_to_output( T_('Website'), 'htmlattr' ).': $user_url$' ) ).'</a>\', \'&nbsp;\' )~'),
5173              );
5174      }
5175  
5176      $filter_reported = param( 'reported', 'integer' );
5177      if( $params['display_reported'] && $filter_reported )
5178      { // Filter is set to 'Reported users'
5179          $userlist_col_reputaion = array(
5180                  'th' => T_('Rep'),
5181                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5182                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5183                  'order' => 'user_rep',
5184                  'default_dir' => 'D',
5185                  'td' => '$user_rep$',
5186              );
5187      }
5188  
5189      if( $params['display_group'] && $UserList->filters['group'] == -1 )
5190      { // List is ungrouped, Display column with group name
5191          $UserList->cols[] = array(
5192                  'th' => T_('Group'),
5193                  'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5194                  'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5195                  'order' => 'grp_name',
5196                  'td' => '$grp_name$ ($grp_level$)',
5197              );
5198      }
5199  
5200      if( is_logged_in() && ! $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'moderate', false ) )
5201      { // Current user has no permissions to moderate the users
5202          if( isset( $userlist_col_reputaion ) )
5203          { // Display the reported users
5204              $UserList->cols[] = $userlist_col_reputaion;
5205          }
5206  
5207          if( $params['display_level'] )
5208          { // Display level
5209              $UserList->cols[] = array(
5210                      'th' => T_('Level'),
5211                      'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5212                      'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5213                      'order' => 'user_level',
5214                      'default_dir' => 'D',
5215                      'td' => '$user_level$',
5216                  );
5217          }
5218      }
5219      else
5220      { // Current user can moderate the users
5221          if( $params['display_status'] )
5222          { // Display status
5223              $UserList->cols[] = array(
5224                      'th' => /* TRANS: Account status */ T_( 'Status' ),
5225                      'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5226                      'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5227                      'order' => 'user_status',
5228                      'default_dir' => 'D',
5229                      'td' => '%user_td_status( #user_status#, #user_ID# )%'
5230                  );
5231          }
5232  
5233          if( isset( $userlist_col_reputaion ) )
5234          { // Display the reported users
5235              $UserList->cols[] = $userlist_col_reputaion;
5236          }
5237  
5238          if( $params['display_level'] )
5239          { // Display level
5240              $UserList->cols[] = array(
5241                      'th' => T_('Level'),
5242                      'th_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5243                      'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap user_level_edit small',
5244                      'order' => 'user_level',
5245                      'default_dir' => 'D',
5246                      'td' => '%user_td_level( #user_ID#, #user_level# )%',
5247                  );
5248          }
5249  
5250          if( $params['display_actions'] )
5251          { // Display actions
5252              $UserList->cols[] = array(
5253                      'th' => T_('Actions'),
5254                      'th_class' => 'small',
5255                      'td_class' => 'shrinkwrap small',
5256                      'td' => '%user_td_actions( #user_ID# )%'
5257                  );
5258          }
5259      }
5260  }

5274  function user_td_grp_actions( & $row )
5275  {
5276      global $usedgroups, $Settings, $current_User;
5277  
5278      $r = '';
5279      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit', false ) )
5280      {
5281          $r = action_icon( T_('Edit this group...'), 'edit', regenerate_url( 'ctrl,action', 'ctrl=groups&amp;action=edit&amp;grp_ID='.$row->grp_ID ) );
5282  
5283          $r .= action_icon( T_('Duplicate this group...'), 'copy', regenerate_url( 'ctrl,action', 'ctrl=groups&amp;action=new&amp;grp_ID='.$row->grp_ID ) );
5284  
5285          if( ($row->grp_ID != 1) && ($row->grp_ID != $Settings->get('newusers_grp_ID')) && !in_array( $row->grp_ID, $usedgroups ) )
5286          { // delete
5287              $r .= action_icon( T_('Delete this group!'), 'delete', regenerate_url( 'ctrl,action', 'ctrl=groups&amp;action=delete&amp;grp_ID='.$row->grp_ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('group') ) );
5288          }
5289          else
5290          {
5291              $r .= get_icon( 'delete', 'noimg' );
5292          }
5293      }
5294      return $r;
5295  }

5317  function user_td_pm( $user_ID, $user_login )
5318  {
5319      global $current_User;
5320  
5321      if( $user_ID == $current_User->ID )
5322      {
5323          return '&nbsp;';
5324      }
5325  
5326      $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
5327      $User = & $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID );
5328      if( $User && ( $User->get_msgform_possibility() == 'PM' ) )
5329      { // return new pm link only, if current User may send private message to User
5330          return action_icon( T_('Private Message').': '.$user_login, 'comments', '?ctrl=threads&action=new&user_login='.$user_login );
5331      }
5332  
5333      return '';
5334  }

5336  function user_td_status( $user_status, $user_ID )
5337  {
5338      global $current_User;
5339  
5340      $user_status_icons = get_user_status_icons( true );
5341      $status_content = $user_status_icons[ $user_status ];
5342  
5343      if( is_admin_page() && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) )
5344      { // current User is an administrator and view is displayed on admin interface, return link to user admin tab
5345          return '<a href="'.get_user_identity_url( $user_ID, 'admin' ).'">'.$status_content.'</a>';
5346      }
5347  
5348      return $status_content;
5349  }

5351  /**
5352   * Get a flag of registration country with a link to user's sessions page
5353   *
5354   * @param integer User ID
5355   * @param string Country code
5356   * @param string Country name
5357   * @return string
5358  */
5359  function user_td_reg_country( $user_ID, $country_code, $country_name )
5360  {
5361      global $current_User, $admin_url;
5362  
5363      $flag = country_flag( $country_code, $country_name, 'w16px', 'flag', '', false, true, '', false );
5364      if( empty( $flag ) )
5365      { // No flag or registration country
5366          $flag = '?';
5367      }
5368  
5369      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
5370      { // Only users with edit all users permission can see the 'Sessions' tab
5371          $flag = '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=user&amp;user_tab=sessions&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID.'">'.$flag.'</a>';
5372      }
5373  
5374      return $flag;
5375  }

5377  /**
5378   * Get user level as link to edit ot as simple text to view
5379   *
5380   * @param integer User_ID
5381   * @param integer User Level
5382   * @return string
5383   */
5384  function user_td_level( $user_ID, $user_level )
5385  {
5386      global $current_User;
5387  
5388      if( $current_User->can_moderate_user( $user_ID ) )
5389      { // Current user can moderate this user
5390          return '<a href="#" rel="'.$user_level.'">'.$user_level.'</a>';
5391      }
5392      else
5393      { // No perms to edit user
5394          return $user_level;
5395      }
5396  }

5398  /**
5399   * Get user level as link to edit ot as simple text to view
5400   *
5401   * @param integer User_ID
5402   * @param integer User Level
5403   * @return string
5404   */
5405  function user_td_actions( $user_ID )
5406  {
5407      global $current_User;
5408  
5409      $r = '';
5410      if( $current_User->can_moderate_user( $user_ID ) )
5411      { // Current user can moderate this user
5412          $r .= action_icon( T_('Edit this user...'), 'edit', regenerate_url( 'ctrl,action', 'ctrl=user&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID.'&amp;user_tab=profile' ) );
5413      }
5414      else
5415      {
5416          $r .= get_icon( 'edit', 'noimg' );
5417      }
5418      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit', false ) )
5419      { // Current user can edit all users
5420          $r .= action_icon( T_('Duplicate this user...'), 'copy', regenerate_url( 'ctrl,action', 'ctrl=user&amp;action=new&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID.'&amp;user_tab=profile' ) );
5421          if( $user_ID != 1 && $user_ID != $current_User->ID )
5422          {
5423              $r .= action_icon( T_('Delete this user!'), 'delete', regenerate_url( 'action', 'action=delete&amp;user_ID='.$user_ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('user') ) );
5424          }
5425          else
5426          {
5427              $r .= get_icon( 'delete', 'noimg' );
5428          }
5429      }
5430  
5431      return $r;
5432  }

5435  /**
5436   * Get an HTML icon to display if organization is accepted by admib or isn't.
5437   *
5438   * @param boolean TRUE if the organization is accepted to the user
5439   * @return string
5440   */
5441  function user_td_orgstatus( $user_ID, $org_ID, $is_accepted )
5442  {
5443      global $current_User;
5444  
5445      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
5446      { // Set the spec params for icon if user is admin
5447          $accept_icon_params = array( 'style' => 'cursor: pointer;', 'rel' => 'org_status_'.( $is_accepted ? 'y' : 'n' ).'_'.$org_ID.'_'.$user_ID );
5448      }
5449      else
5450      {
5451          $accept_icon_params = array();
5452      }
5453  
5454      if( $is_accepted )
5455      { // Organization is accepted by admin
5456          return get_icon( 'allowback', 'imgtag', array_merge( array( 'title' => T_('Accepted') ), $accept_icon_params ) );
5457      }
5458      else
5459      { // Organization is not accepted by admin yet
5460          return get_icon( 'bullet_red', 'imgtag', array_merge( array( 'title' => T_('Not accepted') ), $accept_icon_params ) );
5461      }
5462  }
